Do Muslims have power? Mawlana says, Yes! The true and the only power in this world is in the hands of the Muslims. But they are made to forget it, in order to stay under the command of the non-Muslims and subject to their technological progress and weapons. To illustrate the kind of power Muslims have, Mawlana tells the beautiful story of S. Abu-l Hassan el-Basri and S. "Habibu-l 'Ajami".

Müslümanların gücü var mı? Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Evet" diyor! Bu dünyadaki tek hakiki güç Müslümanların elinde. Ama gayri Müslimlerin kontrolünde ve onların teknolojik gelişme ve silahlarına bağımlı kalmaları için bu gerçek kendilerine unutturuldu. Müslümanların sahip olduğu gücü temsil için Şeyh Efendi Hz, Şeyh Habibul Acemi ile Şeyh Hasan Basri Hz'lerinin güzel hikayesini anlattı.
Mawlana says 70x shame on the Muslims who celebrate Christmas and New Years and follow the lifestyle of shaytan. Learn from the story of Qarun; Dunya is a carcase.
Şeyh Efendi Hz, Noel ve Yeni Yılı kutlayan ve şeytani yaşam tarzını takip eden Müslümanlara 70 kere ayıp ve yazık, dedi. Karun'un hikayesinden ibret alın; Dünya bir leştir.

Mawlana again stressed the value of Adab. And addressing his eldest grandson, Dr. Noor Qabbani, Mawlana showed how the devil infiltrated all aspects of Man's life to make Man, "The Devil's Puppet - مسخرة الشيطان".

Şeyh Efendi Hz, yine Edebin önemini vurguladı. En büyük torunu Dr. Nur Kabbani'ye hitab eden Şeyh Efendi Hz, şeytanın nasıl insanın hayatına bütün yönleriyle sızıp onu "Şeytan'ın Kuklası" haline getirdiğini gösterdi.
مولانا شدد مرة أخرى على قيمة الأدب . وخاطب حفيده الأكبر ، د . نور قباني ، وأظهر مولانا كيف أن الشيطان تسلل الى جميع جوانب حياة الإنسان لجعل الإنسان " مسخرة الشيطان " .
How to "Find One's Guide?" is the question an Austrian professor asked Mawlana.
Bir kimse "Mürşidini Nasıl Bulur?" Avusturyalı bir profosörün Şeyh Efendi Hz'ne sorusu.
Mawlana watched a program that showed the wide variety and complexity of life forms under "The Indian Ocean".
Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Hint Okyanusu" içinde yaşayan çeşitli ve komplex canlıları anlatan bir program izledi.

Mr. Ali Riza, a well-known Cypriot lawyer, asked about the knowledge of the future that some shaykhs have. The Prophet (sAs) is the crown and fountain of knowledge. Yet what can human knowledge attain from the infinity of Allah's Power Oceans and from His Never-Ending Acts of Creation. In this majestic creation even "An Ant Has a Name". When trying to push beyond one's personal limits, Mawlana says, “you must stop. Beyond that you get only the talk of the common people!"

Tanınmış Kıbrıslı avukat, Ali Rıza Bey, bazı Şeyhlerde olan gelecek hakkındaki ilmi sordu. Efendimiz (sas) İlmin Sahibi ve Kaynağı. Bununla birlikte, bizim beşeri ilmimiz Cenab-ı Allah'ın Sonsuz Kudret Okyanuslarından ve O'nun durmayan, Sonsuz Halk Etmesi - Yaratması Eyleminden ne kadarına yetişebilir? Bu muhteşem eserde "Her Karıncanın Bile Bir İsmi Var".

السيد علي رضا ، محامي قبرصي معروف ، سأل عن علم المستقبل الموجود عند بعض المشايخ . النبي عليه الصلاة والسلام هو تاج وينبوع العلم . حتى الآن ما يمكن ان تصل إليه معرفتنا الإنسانية من بحور القوة اللانهائية لله وخَلقه الأبدي المستمر للخلق . في هذا الخلق العظيم حتى " كل نملة لها إسم " . وعند الضغط أبعد من حدود الفرد ، مولانا يقول ، " يجب ان تتوقفوا هنا . أكثر من ذلك تصبحون تتكلمون بلغة العوام ! "

"Give, Bilal, give without refusing, and never fear that what The Lord of The Throne is providing you with, will ever become less - انفق بلالا و لا تخف من ذي العرشِ  إقلالا". This Hadith contains the cure for all the crises of the modern day.
"İnfak et ya Bilal, Arşın Rabbi eksiltir diye korkmadan ver". Bu Hadis-iŞerif zamanımızdaki modern krizlerin devasını taşıyor.

title.text: From The Meanings Of The Holy Quran

info.text: In "Meanings From The Holy Quran - معاني من القرآن الكريم", Mawlana recites seven ayats (verses) of Surat Saba' (34). It gives us a taste of how the meanings of Quran are for every times.
"Kuran-ı Kerim'den Manalar" Şeyh Efendi Hz ile Sebe Suresinden bir okuma. Bize Kuran'ın manalarının bütün zamanlar için geçerli olduğunu gösteriyor.

Mawlānā tells men and women how to protect themselves in the month of Ṣafaru l-Khayr. Say shahādah 3 times and astaghfiru Llāh 300 times each day and cover your heads in green so the angels keep you safe.
Şeyh Efendi Safer ayında kendimizi nasıl koruyacağımızı anlatır. Her gün 3 Şahadet ve 300 Estağfurullah çekerek başlarınızı yeşil ile örtüp sarınız, o zaman melekler sizi korur.
مولانا يخبر الرجال والنساء كيفية حماية أنفسهم في شهر صفر الخير . يقول الشهادة ثلاث مرات وأستغفر الله ثلاثمائة مرة كل يوم ، وقوموا بتغطية رؤوسكم باللون الأخضر لكي تقوم الملائكة بحمايتكم .

A big group of more than 50 Afghanis came from Europe to visit Mawlana for their first time. Last night they came up in two groups to see Mawlana. Mawlana gave them good news and instructions and said these instructions are not only for Afghani people only but for the whole nation of the Beloved (sAs). Mawlana also gave instructions concerning the holy month of Safar, which is starting today. "With the Afghanis - مع أهل أفغانستان".

Avrupadan gelen 50 kişiden daha fazla bir Afgan grubu Şeyh Efendi Hz'ni ilk defa ziyarete geldiler. Dün gece de, iki grup halinde Şeyh Efendi Hz ile görüşmek için yukarı çıktılar. Şeyh Efendi Hz onlara müjde ve talimatlar verdi, ve bu talimatların yalnızca Afganlar için değil bütün Ümmet-i Muhammedi için olduğunu söyledi. Şeyh Efendi Hz, ayrıca bugün başlayan Safer ayı için de talimatlar verdi. "Afganlılar İle".

مجموعة كبيرة من الأفغان تتألف مما يزيد عن خمسين شخصاً قدِموا من اوروبا لزيارة مولانا للمرة الأولى . الليلة الماضية صعدوا بمجموعتين لرؤية مولانا . مولانا أخبرهم أخبار سارة وأعطاهم تعليمات وقال أن هذه التعليمات ليست للأفغان فقط لكن لكل أمة الحبيب صلى الله عليه وسلم . مولانا أيضاً أعطى تعليمات تتعلًق بشهر صفر المقدس الذي يبدأ اليوم ... " مع أهل أفغانستان " .

What is most necessary to learn, is Servanthood. Work for Allah and ask your provision from Him. Allah says, "I created Men and Jinn for My Servanthood. Work for me, I will pay you." The Turks, the Arabs, one by one have abandoned Shariatullah.

Öğrenilmesi en gerekli olan şey, Kulluktur. Allah için çalışın ve rızkınızı O'ndan isteyin. Allah buyurdu, "Ben cinleri ve insanları ancak Bana kulluk etmeleri için yarattım. Ben'im için çalışın ve Ben size ödeyeceğim". Türkler ve Araplar bir bir Allah'ın Şeriatını terk ettiler.

رشيد المريخي يصلًي الجمعة مع الشيخ ناظم . ما هو الأمر الأكثر ضرورة لتعلمه ، هو العبودية . إعملوا لله وإطلبوا العطاء منه . الله تعالى يقول ، " وما خلقت الجن والإنس إلا ليعبدون " . إعملوا لي ، وسأدفع لكم . الأتراك ، العرب الواحد تلو الآخر قد هجروا شريعة الله .

The last night before Sayyid Al-Muraikhi, the Bahraini Shaykh and medih-teller, and his group left, Mawlana gave an important sohbat but of a very familiar nature. First Mawlana spoke about the value of Adab in spiritual progress and in the attainment of spiritual stations. Then Mawlana told several stories from some of the Shaykhs he met or lived with, that reflect their simplicity, humility and Adab. Mawlana also praised Haji Amina Sultan (H. Anne), his wife and "the mother of the children" ( الله يرحمها ).

Bahreynli Şeyh ve Kaside okuyan grubu ayrılmadan önce Şeyh Efendi Hz önemli bir Sohbet verdi. Şeyh Efendi Hz önce, maneviyatın yükselmesinde ve manevi makamlara ulaşılmasında Edeb in önemi hakkında konuştu. Daha sonra, tanıştığı veya birlikte yaşadığı bazı Şeyhlerin sadeliğini, mütevaziliğini ve Edeplerini yansıtan birçok hikayeler anlattı. Şeyh Efendi Hz ayrıca, eşi ve çocuklarının annesi Hacı Anne'yi övdü ( الله يرحمها ).

في الليلة الأخيرة وقبل مغادرة السيد المريخي ، الشيخ البحريني والمداح ، وجماعته ، مولانا أعطى صحبة مهمة ولكن ذات طابع مألوف جداً . وتحدث مولانا أولاً حول قيمة الأدب في التقدم الروحي وبلوغ المقامات الروحانية . ثم قصً مولانا بعض القصص عن بعض المشايخ الذين إلتقى بهم او عاش معهم ، التي تعكس بساطتهم ، إنسانيتهم وأدبهم . كما أشاد مولانا بالحجة أمينة سلطان ( حجة آنة ) ، زوجته و " أم الأولاد " ( رحمها الله ) ..

title.text: In the Love of the Prophet (sas)

info.text: The renowned Bahraini Shaykh Rashid Al-Muraikhi راشد المريخي came to visit Mawlana last night. He came in a group of four, one of them is a Judge in the High Court of Justice, in Bahrain. Shaykh Rashid Al-Muraikhi راشد المريخي took Baiat from Mawlana and Mawlana gave him Izin/authorisation of 40 Tariqats.

Bahreynli tanınmış bir Medih okuyan ve Tarikatta Şeyh olan zat, dün gece Şeyh Efendi Hz'ni ziyerete geldi. Kendisi, 4 kişilik bir grup ile geldi ki, bir tanesi Bahreyn Yüksek Mahkemesinde hakim. "Efendimizin (sas) Aşkında"

مادح بحريني مشهور للنبي عليه الصلاة والسلام ، الذي هو أيضاً شيخ طريقة جاء لزيارة مولانا الليلة الماضية . جاء مع مجموعة من أربعة أشخاص ، أحدهم هو قاضٍ في محكمة العدل العليا ، في البحرين .... " في حب النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم " .

Mawlana gave an important sohbat about "Ikhwan, Salafi, Wahabi and Shi'at - إخوان، سلفي، وهابي و شيعة" and their relationship to the holy message of Prophet (sas) and the role they play in the Muslim community.
Şeyh Efendi Hz, "İhvan, Selefi, Vahabi, ve Şii'ler" ve onların Efendimizin (sas) Risaleti ile ilişkileri ve Müslüman toplumunda oynadıkları rol ile ilgili konuştu.
مولانا أعطى صحبة مهمة عن " إخوان ، سلفي ، وهابي وشيعة " وعلاقتهم بالرسالة المقدسة للنبي صلى الله عليه وسلم والدور الذي يلعبونه بالمجتمع المسلم .

Mawlana defines the meaning of Justice versus that of Equality. A good illustration is the equality between men and women in modern times, is it Justice? "Equality Is Not Justice - المساواةُ ليست عدلاً".
Şeyh Efendi Hz, eşitliğin anlamına karşılık adaletin anlamını tarif ediyor. Modern zamanımızdaki kadın-erkek eşitliği bunun iyi bir örneği, bu adalet mi? "Eşitlik Adalet Değildir".
مولانا يعرًف معنى العدالة في مقابل المساواة . ومن الأمثلة الجيدة على ذلك المساواة بين الرجل والمرأة في العصر الحديث ، هل هذه عدالة ؟ " المساواة ليست عدلاً " .
Twice after Fajr prayer, Mawlana spoke about the end of times. He spoke about "Armageddon - الملحمة الكبرى" and all the preparations for it.
Sabah namazından sonra Şeyh Efendi Hz iki seferdir Ahir Zaman hakkında konuşuyor. "Armageddon" ve onun hazırlıklarlarından bahsediyor.
مرتين بعد صلاة الفجر ، تحدث مولانا عن آخر الزمان . تحدث عن " الملحمة الكبرى " وكافة الاستعدادات لها .

title.text: Don't Save Money but Save Honor
حفظ الكرامة أفضل من حفظ المال

info.text: The Lord of heavens is angry with Man. Man was made on the highest level and is making himself on the lowest. Try to please your Lord. Ask for forgiveness.
Alemlerin Rabbi, insanlara öfkeli. İnsan en yüksek mertebede yaratıldı ama kendini en alçak mertebeye indirdi. Rabbinizi hoşnut etmeye çalışın. Af dileyin.
Addressing his Russian guests, Mawlana mentions several Russian Tzars. Then Mawlana tells the full story of "Hala Sultan - أم حِرام بنت ملحان".
Kendisini ziyaret eden Rus misafirlerine konuşan Şeyh Efendi Hz, birçok Rus Çarından bahsetti. Daha sonra ise "Hala Sultan" ın hikayesini anlattı.
مولانا ذكر العديد من قياصرة الروس أثناء حديثهً مع ضيوفه من روسيا . بعدها مولانا روى قصة " أم حِرام بنت ملحام " الكاملة
Mawlana discusses several important issues with his guest, the Turkish professor of Theology. Then Mawlana tells the beautiful story of "Yayan Dede - The Walking Saint - الصحابي المُرتَحِل".
Şeyh Efendi Hz, İlahiyat profosörü misafiri ile pekçok önemli konuyu tartışıyor. Daha sonra da "Yayan Dede" nin güzel hikayesini anlatıyor.
مولانا يناقش عدة قضايا مهمة مع ضيفه ، أستاذ علم التوحيد التركي . ثم مولانا يروي القصة الجميلة " الصحابي المُرتَحِل " .

A group of Russian ladies they came to meet Mawlana. They became Muslim and asked for new Muslim names. "Allah Is the All-Beautiful - الله جميل يحب الجمال - Allah Güzeldir, Güzelliği Sever" (Hadith Sharif).
Bir grup Rus hanım Şeyh Efendi Hz ile görüşmeye geldi. Müslüman olarak yeni İslami isim aldılar. "Allah Güzeldir, Güzelliği Sever".
Mawlana directs an urgent and strong message to Cypriots, all of them, whether Muslims or Christians, Turkish or Greek. "Let Them Make Peace - Barışsınlar - الصلح خير".
Şeyh Efendi Hz, Kıbrıs'a acil ve önemli bir mesaj yöneltti: hepsi, Müslüman veya Hristiyan, Türk veya Rum, "Barışsınlar".
*** مولانا يوجه رسالة عاجلة وقوية للقبارصة ، جميعهم ،سواء كانوا مسلمين او مسيحييًن ، أتراك او يونانييًن. " الصلح خير " ...
Mawlana reminds us that no matter how dark the world is becoming, Allah promised that "The Morning Is Near - الصبح قريب".
Daha sonra Şeyh Efendi Hz, dünya ne kadar karanlık bir hale gelirse gelsin, Cenab-ı Allah'ın "Sabah Vakti Yakın (Hud-81)" diye vaad ettiğini hatırlatıyor.

Addressing his Russian guests, Mawlana says that democracy brings in power people that have no qualification or preparation for the positions they suddenly acquire. Democracy functions through fragmenting the society to always smaller & smaller segments, feeding and magnifying dissent. In Democratic thought, Legislation is no longer for the Divine following a Sacred Book; it is for the people following their wills and desires, gradually leaving no place for the Sacred... "Democracy Is Haram"

مُخاطباً ضيوفه من روسيا ، مولانا قال ان الديمقراطية تًحضر الى السلطة الناس الذين ليسوا مؤهلين ولا مُحضًرين للمناصب التي حصلوا عليها فجأة . وظائف الديمقراطية هي تفتيت المجتمع الى شرائح أصغر وأصغر دائماً ، تغذي وتكبًر المعارضة . في الفكر الديمقراطي ، لم يعد التشريع الإلهي هو الكتاب المتبع ، إنه للناس الذين يتبعون إراداتهم ورغباتهم ، يتركونه تدريجياً لا يوجد مكان للدين " الديمقراطية حرام " ...

Addressing his Russian guests, Mawlana describes Modern Man's plight. Technology, which is infiltrating every aspect of modern life, functions by depriving man of his uniqueness, individuality, humanity, and, consequently, of his innate freedom. Yet everywhere they shout, 'Man is Free', without the slightest clue as to what that means. What we are desperate for is not a political or an economic solution. What we need is a "Change from A to Z".

Rus misafirlerine hitab eden Şeyh Efendi Hz, modern insanın durumunu tasvir etti. Modern hayatın her yönüne nüfuz eden teknoloji insanı şahsiyetinden, eşsizliğinden, insanlığından ve sonuç olarak içsel özgürlüğünden mahrum edecek şekilde çalışıyor. Buna rağmen heryerde, artık bunun ne olduğu hakkında hiçbir fikirleri olmadığı halde, 'İnsan Özgürdür" diye bağırıyorlar. Bu yüzden, bizim ümitsizce ihtiyaç duyduğumuz ekonomik veya siyasi bir çözüm değil. Bizim ihtiyacımız olan "A'dan Z'ye Değişim".

مخاطباً ضيوفه الروس ، مولانا وصف محنة الإنسان الحديث . التكنولوجيا ، التي تتسلل الى كل جانب من جوانب الحياة العصرية ، تعمل من خلال تجريد الإنسان من تميًزه ، الشخصية ، الإنسانية وبالتالي من حريًته الذاتية . حتى الآن في كل مكان يصرخون " الإنسان حر " ، بدون وجود أي دليل على ما يعنيه ذلك بعد الآن . لذلك ما نحن بحاجة ماسة إليه ليس حلاً سياسياً او إقتصادياً . ما نحتاجه هو " تغيير من الألف الى الياء " .

title.text: Suratu r Rahman Is the Bride of Quran

info.text: An old murid, a professor of Philosophy, sent a message asking about the meaning of the Hadith Sherif, "Suratu r-Rahman Is the Bride of Quran - سورة الرحمن عروس القرآن".
مريد قديم ، أستاذ في الفلسفة ، أرسل رسالة يسأل عن معنى الحديث الشريف ، " سورة الرحمن عروس القرآن " ...

In a sohbat to his guest, a Yemeni prince, Mawlana addresses all Arabs. Mawlana reminds the Arabs of the honor granted to them till the Day of Judgement and the huge responsibility that comes along with that honor. "Where Is Your Imam?".

Kendisini ziyaret eden Yemenli bir Prense verdiği sohbette, Şeyh Efendi Hz tüm Araplara hitab etti. Şeyh Efendi Hz Araplara, Kıyamet Gününe kadar kendilerine bahşedilen şerefi ve bu şerefle birlikte gelen büyük sorumluluğu hatırlattı. "İmamınız Nerede?"
في صحبة لزائره ، أمير يمني ، مولانا خاطب كل العرب . مولانا ذكًر العرب بالشرف الذي أعطي لهم الى يوم القيامة والمسؤولية الضخمة التي تأتي جنباً الى جنب مع هذا الشرف ... " أين إمامكم ؟" ...

After Fajr prayer, Mawlana examined Modern Man's condition and claims. Modern Man is so modernized. He reached the peak of civilization. He has achieved what no one before him could ever achieve. He became what he himself could have never imagined.

Şeyh Efendi Hz, sabah namazından sonra modern insanın durumunu ve iddialarını sorguladı. Modern insan çok medeni. Medeniyetin son noktasına ulaşmış. Kendisinden önce kimsenin başaramadıklarını başarmış. Kendisinin bile asla hayal edemeyeceği birşey olmuş.
بعد صلاة الفجر ، مولانا درس أحوال وإدعاءات الإنسان الحضاري . الإنسان الحضاري هو متحضًر جداً. وصل الى قمة الحضارة . لقد أنجز ما لم يُنجزه أحد من قبله . لقد وصل الى ما لم يكن يتصوًر أبداً ...

So many unexpected events are coming as signs of the last days. Come and keep the Way of the Lord of Heavens. Who follows the Heavenly Orders is going to have a sweet life. We are Muslims, followers of the Holy Orders from Heavens.

Kıyametin alametleri olarak pekçok beklenmedik vakıalar geliyor. Gelin ve Alemlerin Rabbi'nin Yolunu tutun. Kim İlahi Emirleri takip ederse tatlı bir hayatı olacak. Biz Müslümanlarız, Göklerden gelen İlahi Emirlerin takipçileriyiz.
الكثير من الأحداث غير المتوقعة تأتي كعلامات على آخر الزمان . تعال وحافظ على طريق رب العالمين . من يتبع الأوامر السماوية ستكون حياته حلوة . نحن مسلمون ، نتبع أوامر السماء المباركة .

Addressing his guest, a Lebanese doctor, Mawlana asks an important question: What are you taking from this life for the Here, and what are you taking from it for the Hereafter? Then Mawlana tells about "Alexander the Great's Will".

Misafiri Lübnanlı bir doktora hitab eden Şeyh Efendi Hz önemli bir soru soruyor: Bu hayattan dünya için ne alıyorsunuz, ahiret için ne alıyorsunuz? Daha sonra Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Büyük İskender'in Vasiyeti" hakkında konuştu.
مُخاطباً ضيفه ، دكتور لبناني ، مولانا سأل سؤال مهم : ماذا تأخذ من هذه الحياة لهذه الدنيا ، وماذا تأخذ منها للآخرة ؟ بعدها مولانا تحدث عن " وصية الإسكندر الأكبر " .

Mawlana prays for all the Muslim leaders to be able to see the Truth and to find the Right Way. Satanic ideas are prevalent everywhere. One sentence is the pillar of all True belief. Shaytan urges his followers not to finish this sentence but to stop half way, in order to get "A Diploma from Shaytan - شهادة من الشيطان" and become certified members of the satanic kingdom. Audhu Billah, أعوذُ بِالله!

Şeyh Efendi Hz ,bütün Müslüman liderlerin Hak olanı görmeleri ve Hak yolu bulabilmeleri için dua ediyor. Şeytani fikirler heryerde hüküm sürüyor. Bütün Hak dinlerin şartı ise tek bir cümle. Halbuki Şeytan, kendi takipçilerini bu cümleyi bitirmeyip "Şeytandan Diploma" almak için yarı yolda bırakmaları ve şeytani krallığın diplomalı birer üyesi olmaları için teşvik ediyor. Allah'a sığındık.

مولانا دعى لجميع القادة المسلمين على ان يكونوا قادرين على رؤية الحقيقة وإيجاد الطريق الصحيح . الأفكار الشيطانية منتشرة في كل مكان . جملة واحدة هي ركيزة كل الإعتقاد الصحيح . لكن الشيطان يحث أتباعه على أن لا يُنهوا هذه الجملة ويتوقفوا في نصف الطريق ، من أجل الحصول على " شهادة من الشيطان " وأن يصبحوا أعضاء متخرجين في مملكة الشيطان . أعوذ بالله !
Pray 4 Raka't, each raka't read Fatiha and 11 times Ikhlas
4 rekatlık namaz, her rekata Fatiha'dan sonra 11 kere İhlası oku

Mawlana addressed his honorable guests, the Yemeni Prince and the Malaysian Doctor and his family. The address was half in Arabic and half in English. Mawlana pointed to a prevalent spiritual vice, the political and social implications of which, lead to the many crises in today's world. "The Love of Leadership - حب الرِّياسة".

Şeyh Efendi Hz saygın misafirleri Yemen Prensi, Malezyalı doktor ve ailesine hitab etti. Hitabını yarı Arapça, yarı İngilizce yaptı. Şeyh Efendi Hz önemli bir manevi zaafa işaret etti ki, bunun siyasi ve sosyal çıkarımları modern zamanda pekçok beşeri krizlere neden oluyor. "Riyaset Sevgisi".

مولانا خاطب زواره المشرفين ، الأمير اليمني والدكتور الماليزي وعائلته . الخطاب كان نصفه باللغة العربية ونصفه الآخر باللغة الإنكليزية . مولانا أشار الى نائب روحاني مهم ، الآثار السياسية والإجتماعية التي ، تؤدي الى الكثير من الأزمات الإنسانية في العصر الحديث ... " حب الرئاسة " .
Mawlānā spoke about the day of ‘Āshūrā’ and Grandshaykh to the big group of brothers and sisters that comes up to see him before Maghrib.
Şeyh Efendi Hz, bugün akşam namazından önce kendisini görmeye gelen büyük bir gruba Aşure Günü ve BüyükŞeyh Abdullah Dağıstani Hz hakkında konuştu.
مولانا تحدث عن يوم عاشوراء ومولانا الشيخ لمجموعة كبيرة من الإخوان والأخوات الذين صعدوا لرؤيته قبل المغرب اليوم ... " في يوم عاشوراء " .
With a simple, but brilliant, story Mawlana reveals the germ that causes the disease from which all our social and political institutions suffer...."Sultans or Merchants?"
بقصة بسيطة لكنها رائعة ، مولانا يكشف النقاب عن الجرثومة التي تسبب بالفساد ، التي تعاني منها كل مؤسساتنا الإجتماعية والسياسية ، في أيامنا هذه ... " ملوك ولا تجار ؟ " ..
Mawlana says, Teach everyone, everywhere, we have been created for our Lord's servanthood.
Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Her yerde, herkese, Rabbimizin kulluğu için yaratıldığımızı öğretin" buyuruyor.
On being told that both the US and Europe are praising the fairness of the elections in Egypt, Mawlana described "The Sultanate of the Demons".
Kendisine, Avrupa ve Amerika'nın Mısır'da yapılan seçimleri dürüst ve tarafsız diyerek övdükleri söylenmesi üzerine Şeyh Efendi Hz, "İblislerin Saltanatı" nı tarif etti.
قيل لمولانا ان أميركا وأوروبا يُشيدون بنزاهة الإنتخابات في مصر . مولانا وصف " سلطنة العفاريت " .

title.text: It Is the Responsibility of the Men

info.text: "It Is the Responsibility of the Men - مسئولية الرجال" is a short talk to a Palestinian father and son, containing important instructions for young men and their parents about marriage and clothing.
*** " مسؤولية الرجال " هو حديث قصير مع أب فلسطيني وإبنه ، يحتوي على تعليمات هامة بالنسبة للشبان وأولياء أمورهم عن الزواج والملابس ...
Mawlana gave important instructions about "The End of Times" to some of his old murids who are returning home.
Şeyh Efendi Hz, evlerine dönen eski müridlerine "Ahir Zaman" ile ilgili önemli talimatlar verdi.

Last night, at dinner table, Mawlana addressed his honorable guests and asked us to put this sohbat online quickly. If Allah (swt) is not at the core of Man's consciousness and endeavour, then Man's efforts and aims are all "To Mars".

Şeyh Efendi Hz dün akşam yemeğinde asil misafirlerine hitab etti ve bizden bu sohbeti hemen yayımlamamızı istedi. Eğer insanların akıllarının ve işlerinin özünde Allah (cc) olmazsa, o zaman bütün emek ve gayretleri "Mars'a".
مخاطباً ضيفه ، السيد متين شادي ، رجل أعمال قبرصي وسياسي بارز ، مولانا ناقش ، " سياسة العالم ونهاية العالم " . السيد شادي سأل مولانا عن الكثير من المواضيع المعاصرة التي تُشغل وتُقلق الكثير منا .
Mawlana briefly describes the sunnah concerning the arrival of al-Mahdi, for whom he has been waiting for 70 years.

A Minister wanted his King to benefit first from the treasures of a merchant ship but the King scolded him instead of praising him. From this story Mawlānā draws a lesson for all the governments of the modern world.
Kral'ın bakanlarından biri önce ticari bir gemideki hazinelerden farydalanmasını ister. Ama Kral onu öveceği yerde, azarlamış. Bu hikaye ile modern dünyanın tüm hükümetlerine bir ders veriyor.
أراد أحد الوزراء من ملكه أن يستفيد أولا من كنوز سفينة تجارية ، لكن الملك وبخه بدلا من أن يمدحه . من هذه القصة يعطي مولانا درسا لجميع حكومات العالم الحديث .
Mawlana gives advice for the difficult times ahead.
Mawlana tells a funny story about a man pretending to be a scholar.

After welcoming and congratulating him and his family on their Hajj, Mawlana addresses Shaykh Hisham Qabbani on the rule for Islamic gatherings. Sh. Hisham Hz. is attending an Islamic conference in Istanbul in two days. Mawlana sets the basis for an Islamic conference. In so far as it is Islamic, any conference has to comply to the Quranic command: "Hold together to Allah's Word". It has to protect two main pillars "unity" and "Haqq". Therefore, anyone (or anything) that sneaks in such gatherings to create confusion, argument or dissent, should be immediately dismissed and banned. "Beware of Impostors - احذروا المدسوسين".

بعد الترحيب وتهنأته وعائلته بحجًهم ، مولانا خاطب الشيخ هشام قباني عن قوانين الإجتماعات الإسلامية . الشيخ هشام يحضًر لمؤتمر إسلامي في إسطنبول بعد يومين . مولانا وضع أسس المؤتمر الإسلامي . بقدر ما هو إسلامي ، أي مؤتمر يجب ان يمتثل لأوامر القرآن الكريم : " وإعتصموا بحب الله جميعاً " . إنها لحماية دعامتين أساسيتين " الوحدة " و " الحق " . لذلك ، كل شخص ( او كل شيء ) يتسلل الى هكذا إجتماعات لإحداث فوضى ، نقاش او إنشقاق ، يجب ان يُطرد ويُحظًر في الحال ... " إحذروا المدسوسين " .

Yesterday was very crowded day in Lefke. Mawlana met with many large groups of people. To a group of about 30 Turkish ladies, Mawlana gave important "Advice and Instructions to Ladies - Hanımlara Nasihat - أدب و حشمة للنساء".
الأمس كان يوم حاشد في ليفكا . مولانا تقابل مع الكثير من المجموعات الكبيرة من الناس . لمجموعة مؤلفة من ثلاثين سيدة تركية ، مولانا أعطى صحبة مهمة عن " أدب وحشمة النساء " .

Mawlana explains "The Wisdom of the Seasons - Mevsimlerin Hikmeti", and how their alternation is created for the benefit of Man. But as with everything else, modern man misses the wisdom of their change. The change of seasons becomes another thing that add to the complexity of modern man's life and carries him farther away from the main goal of his existence.

Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Mevsimlerin Hikmeti" ni ve mevsimlerin değişmesinin nasıl insanların faydası için yaratıldığını anlatıyor. Ama modern insan, herşeyde olduğu gibi mevsimlerin değişimindeki hikmeti de kaçırıyor. Mevsimlerin değişimi, insanların hayatlarındaki karmaşayı arttıran ve onları varoluşlarının asıl amacından daha da uzaklaştıran başka bir şeye dönüşüyor.

Mawlānā said on this Friday, the last day of the year 1432, that we have until next Friday to prepare ourselves, "No joke," time is over. Keep close to your homes. Take shelter in Allāh ﷻ. Shelter is in obedience.

Şeyh Efendi Hz. bu Cuma, 1432 senesinin son gününde, kendimizi hazırlamak için gelecek Cuma’ya kadar vaktimiz olduğunu söyledi; "Şaka değil", zaman doldu. Evlerinize yakın olun. Allah'a ﷻ sığının. O’na ﷻ itaat eden korunur.
قال مولانا يوم الجمعة ، آخر يوم من عام ١٤٣٢ ، إن لدينا حتى يوم الجمعة المقبل لنعد أنفسنا ، "لا مزاح" ، انتهى الوقت . ابقوا في منازلكم . احتموا بالله . الإحتماء في الطاعة .
The Lord dressed us with a beautiful appearance and greeted us with salams. Love Him and respect Him and have adab. Be one of those brought near, al-Muqarrabun.
Allah bizlere güzel bir görünüm giydirdi ve bizleri selam ile karşıladı. O'nu sevin, saygı gösterin ve edepli olun. Yakın kılınanlardan birisi yani el-Muqarrabun olun.
ألبسنا الله مظهر جميل واستقبلنا بالسلام . أحبه واحترمه وكن ذو أدب . كن واحدا من أولئك المقربين .

Mawlānā says that nearness to the Lord is a different kind of secret. He discloses this through the Quranic verse: “Then, follow me, Allāh will love you” (3:31), while simultaneously making a rich supplication to demonstrate the secret of drawing near.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Allaha olan yakınlığın farklı bir sır olduğunu söyledi. Bunu bir Kuar Ayeti ile açıkladı. ‘Öyleyse beni takip edizin, Allah ta sizi sevecek’ (3.31), aynı anda yakınlığın sırrını göstermek için büyük bir dua ederek bunu açıkladı.
يقول مولانا أن التقرب إلى الله هو نوع مختلف من السر . انه يكشف ذلك من خلال الآية القرآنية : " فَاتَّبِعُونِي يُحْبِبْكُمُ اللَّهُ "، في حين جعل الدعاء يظهر سِرُ التقرًب .

title.text: من عند رسول الله (صلى الله عليه و سلم)

info.text: Mawlana tells us where the most holy place is and why.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri en mübarek yerleri ve neden mübarek olduklarını bizlere söyledi.
مولانا يخبرنا أين يقع أقدس مكان ولماذا .
The Prophet Adam (as) descended on earth with a wooden staff. Mawlana explains one of the lessons we should learn from this story.
Adem Aleyhisselam yeryüzüne ahşap bir düzenek ile indi. Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bu hikayeden almamız gereken derslerden birini açıklar.
النبي آدم عليه السلام نزل الى الأرض مع عصا خشبية . مولانا يشرح أحد الدروس الذي يجب علينا أن نتعلمها من هذه القصة .
Our Lord created us in the most beautiful form. Our Master (sas) was given the biggest share of this beauty and all of us take shares from him. So be beautiful. Run from ugliness.
Rabbimiz bizleri olabilecek en güzel biçimde yarattı. Efendimiz(sas)'e bu güzelliğin en büyük payı verildi ve hepimiz bundan pay aldık. Öyle ise güzel olunuz. Çirkinlikten kaçınız.
خلقنا ربنا في أحسن تقويم . أعطي سيدنا صلى الله عليه وسلم أكبر نصيب من هذا الجمال وكل واحد منا يأخذ نصيب منه . لذلك كن جميلا . اهرب من القبح .
No one can reach the beauty ocean of the Ḥabīb ﷺ. If he does, he will drown. Be filled with love and longing for Allāh ﷻ and His ﷻ Beloved.
Kimse Peygamber Efendimizin güzellikler okyanusuna erişemez. Erişse boğulacak. Allah'a ve onun en Sevgili Peygamberine sevgi ve özlem ile dolu olunuz.
لا أحد يمكنه أن يصل إلى محيط جمال الحبيب . اذا وصل ، سيغرق . كن مليئاً بالمحبة والعشق لله وحبيبه .
Mawlana recites this ayat and presents us with one of its meanings given to the holy ones. He explains the vastness of its significance to protect us from ourselves and all other enemies of Allah.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bu ayeti okur ve İlahi olanlara verilmiş olan manalarından bir tanesini bizlere sunar. Kendimizi nefsimizden ve Allahın diğer düşmanlarından korumanın öneminin büyüklüğünü açıklar.
مولانا قرأ هذه الآية وقدم لنا معنى من معانيها الذي يُعطى للأولياء . فسًر ضخامة معناها لحمايتنا من أنفسنا ومن جميع أعداء الله الآخرين .
In this beautiful morning ṣuḥbah Mawlānā contemplates the Majesty of the Almighty ﷻ who created man and gave him expression and the love for the Master “to whom all things flow.”
Bu güzel sabah sohbetinde Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Yüce Allahın görkemi üzerinde durdu, o ki insanı yarattı ve ona ifade ile Efendisine olan sevgisini verdi, ‘Ona ki her şey akar’.
في صحبة هذا الصباح الجميلة مولانا يتأمل عظمة الله سبحانه وتعالى الذي خلق الإنسان وأعطاه التعبير والمحبة للسيد ،" الذي يتدفق له كل شيء ".
Man was dressed in the light of the Owner of the Throne. Beauty is perfection. That is why the Prophet was called Al-Mustafa (sas).
İnsanoğlu Arşın sahibinin ışığında giyindirildi. Güzellik mükemmelliktir. Peygamberimize El-Mustafa (sas) denilmesinin sebebi budur.
لُبًس الإنسان بنور مالك العرش . الجمال هو الكمال . لهذا السبب سُمي النبي المصطفى عليه الصلاة والسلام .
“Wealth and children are an ornament of the life of the world. But the good deeds that endure are better in thy Lord’s sight for reward, and better in respect of hope”. (18:46)
Servet ve çocuklar dünya hayatının süsüdür. Fakat yapılan iyilikler Allah katında ödüllendirilmek için daha iyidir ve umut açısından daha iyidir. (18:46)
" الْمَالُ وَالْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ". يقول مولانا لكسب العبودية الحقيقية يعني يجب علينا أن نترك أمور هذه الدنيا . نحن لله ، وليس لأولادنا ، أو للذهب والفضة ، أو لثروة هذه الدنيا .
Look for the beautiful things, the things acceptable to Allah. Look for the honey of the heavens.
Güzel şeyleri arayın, Allah tarafından kabul edilebilir şeyleri. Cennetlerin balını arayınız.
ابحثوا عن الأشياء الجميلة ، الأشياء المقبولة عند الله . ابحثوا عن عسل الجنة .
Mawlana blesses the women in the garden after Jumaa prayer and honors them by calling them all his daughters.
Şeyh Efendii Hazretleri Cuma namazından sonra bahçedeki kadınlara dua etti ve tümünün kızları olduğunu söyleyerek onları onurlandırdı.
مولانا يبارك النساء في الحديقة بعد صلاة الجمعة ويشرفهن بتسميتهن بناته .

In this beautiful sohbat addressed to Sheikh Mehmet, Mawlana talks about how to be among the beautiful ones who are accepted in Allah’s Presence. The Lord is giving. Who is there to receive? Love and receive love and light.

Bu güzel sohbette Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Şeyh Mehmet Efendiye hitap ederek, Güzel olanların ki onlar Allah'ın Huzurunda kabul edilmiştir, aralarında nasıl olunabileceği hakkında konuştu. Rabbimiz veriyor. Almak için orada hazır olan kim vardır? Seviniz ve sevgi ile nur alınız.
في هذه الصحبة الجميلة الموجهة إلى الشيخ محمد ، مولانا يتحدث عن كيفية أن تكون من بين الذين يتمتعون بالجمال والمقبولين في حضرة الله . الله يعطي . من يوجد هناك ليتلقى ؟ أحب وتلقى الحب والنور .
Mawlana reminds us of the honor we have been given and the thanks we owe to Allah. In every moment we should magnify our Lord - Allahu Akbar!
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bizlere Allah tarafından veilmiş olan şeref ve O'na borçlu olduğumuz şükürü bize hatırlattı. Her anımızda Rabbimize övgüler yağdırmalıyız, Allahu Ekber!
مولانا يذكرنا بالشرف الذي تم منحنا اياه ونحن مدينون بالشكر لله . في كل لحظة يجب علينا تكبير ربنا - الله أكبر !
Mawlana speaks about the significance of Bismillahi r-Rahmani r-Rahim. He supplicates that we strive to be dressed with the robe of honour that comes with its light as it contains a divine secret.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Bismillahi r-Rahmani r-Rahim'in önemi hakkında konuşuyor. Yakarıyor ki bizler şeref kaftanı ile giyindirilelim diye çabalıyor olalım, öyle ki bu kaftan nuru ile geliyor ve İlahi Sırları içerisinde saklıyor.
مولانا يتحدث عن أهمية بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم . انه يتوسل أن نسعى إلى أن نلبس بثوب الشرف الذي يأتي بالنور حيث أنه يحتوي على السر إلإلهي .
Mawlana welcomes his son Sheikh Mehmed with blessings. He tells us through him, to look for the things of Heaven not the things of dunya and to find honor in closeness to the Sultan.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri oğlu Şeyh Mehmeti dualar ile ağırlıyor. Onun aracılığı ile bizlere diyor ki, Cennetlerin olan şeylere bakın Dünyanın olanlara değil ve şeref bulmak için Sultana yakın olun.
مولانا رحًب بإبنه الشيخ محمد بالبركات . أخبرنا من خلاله ، أن نبحث عن الأمور العائدة الى السماء وليس عن أمور الدنيا وإيجاد الشرف في القرب من السلطان .
Mawlana speaks from the special knowledge given for the presence of Sheikh Mehmet Effendi about the secrets of mentioning the Name of Allah before beginning anything.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bir şeye başlamadan önce Allahın adını anmanın sırları hakkında Şeyh Mehmet Efendinin varlığı için verilen özel bilgilerden konuştu.
مولانا تحدث من العلم الخاص نظرا لوجود الشيخ محمد أفندي عن أسرار ذكر اسم الله قبل البدء بأي شيء .
Mawlana lovingly greets Haji Mehmet. Praising him, he supplicates that Allah increase his honour as “He is my Successor”.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri sevgi ile Hacı Mehmeti selamlıyor. Ona övgüler ediyor ve niyaz ediyor ki 'Şeyh Efendinin Halife' olduğu için Allah onun şerefini arttırsın.
مولانا يحيي الحج محمد بمحبة . مشيدا به ، يتوسل أن يزيد الله شرفه بأنه " خليفتنا ".

title.text: The Words of the People of Allah

info.text: Many times in his sohbats, Mawlana addresses some shaykhs or politicians. Some of those addressed by Mawlana requested that the video, in which they were addressed, to be removed from the Internet. Mawlana gave an important answer in which he clarified the nature of his addresses and the secrets of Sohbat. "The Words of the People of Allah".

Şeyh Efendi Hz, çoğu zaman Sohbetlerinde bazı şeyh veya politikacılara hitab ediyor. Ve, Şeyh Efendi Hz tarafından muhatap tutulan kimselerden bazıları, kendilerine hitab edilen videoların internetten kaldırılmasını istiyorlar. Şeyh Efendi Hz, hitablarının tabiatını ve Sohbetlerinin sırlarını aydınlatan önemli bir cevap verdi.

عدة مرات في صحبه ، مولانا خاطب بعض المشايخ او الساسة .بعض هؤلاء الذين خوطبوا من قِبل مولانا طلبوا ان الفيديو ، الذي خوطبوا فيه ، ان يُزال من الإنترنت . مولانا أعطى جواب مهم الذي وضًح فيه طبيعة خطابه وأسرار الصحبة . " كلام أهل الله " .
Mawlana sends greetings to the German Crown Prince and to all crown princes.
مولانا يُرسل تحياته لولي عهد المانيا ولجميع الأمراء المتوًجين ...
Two days ago, Mawlana gave Haji Rukeya Sultan a "Wird" and asked her to teach the ladies. Then Mawlana told the story of Ahmed, Sh. Sharafuddin's servant, and how he used to make his big Wird!
منذ يومين ، مولانا أعطى الحجة رقية سلطان " ورد " وطلب منها تعليمه للسيدات . بعدها مولانا تحدث عن قصة احمد ، خادم مولانا الشيخ شرف الدين ، وكيف كان يعمل ورده الكبير !

This sohbat is addressed to Sh Habib Ali Jifry and the Islamic scholars meeting in Amman Jordan this evening. Mawlana discharges his obligation to warn the Scholars that everything is clear in the Quran. After this talk the responsibility lies with the scholars to get the message across to the people.
الشيخ محمد ناظم الحقاني يخاظب أولي العلم و الفقه و السلوك بالخاصة الشيخ الحبيب علي الجفري ويحثه أن يؤدي الأمانة و يرشد الأمة على طريق النجاة مما وقعت فيه من ضيق و مآسي
Mawlana recited the Prophet's Hadith, "الدين النصيحة - Religion Is Advice". Mawlana gives important instructions that all Muslims should pay attention to.

“Moonlight Encyclopedic Academy - أكاديمية مون لايت الموسوعية" is the true school that can actually teach young people something real about themselves and their surroundings. It is the alternative to the present educational institutions that leave our children ignorant, arrogant and alienated.

*** " أكاديمية مون لايت الموسوعية " هي المدرسة الحقيقية التي يمكنها حقيقةً تعليم الشباب شيء ما حقيقي عن أنفسهم ومحيطهم . إنها المخرج من مؤسسة التعليم الحالية التي تجعل أولادنا جاهلين ، متكبًرين وغريبي الأطوار !...

Addressing his grandson Dr. Nour Qabbani, Mawlana explains how the Wahabi thinking fails to meet the requirements of the core of Islam. The Saudis' constant renovating and extending of the "Haram as-Sharif - Harem-i Şerif - الحرم الشريف" is a perfect illustration of this. To make the point clearer, Mawlana compares the Haram at the time he went on Hajj to how it is now!

الثانية ، وخاطب حفيده الدكتور نور قباني ، مولانا شرح كيف ان الأفكار الوهابية فشِلت في الوصول الى جوهر الإسلام ومُتطلباته . المجهود السعودي المتواصل لترميم وتوسيع " الحرم الشريف " هو توضيح كامل عن هذا . لجعلها أكثر وضوحاً ، مولانا قارن كيف كان الحرم عندما ذهب الى الحج وكيف هو الآن!

"Allah'ın Varlığını İnkar - Denying the Existence of Allah (swt) - إنكار الحق عزَّ و جلَّ" is against every cell of our being that carries the Divine Stamp of Al-Haqq and witnesses to His Almightiness (swt).
" إنكار الحق عزً وجلً " هو ضد كل خلية في جسدنا التي تحمل الختم الإلهي للحق وتشهد على قدرة الله سبحانه وتعالى .
Today Mawlana said, if you think that when you die it is finished, this is kufr. Allah says, if you surrender to Me, I will open for you. The Angel of Death is coming nearer. Prepare yourself.
Bugün Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Eğer öldüğünüzde herşeyin bittiğini düşünürseniz bu küfürdür. Allah "Eğer Bana teslim olursanız, size açarım" buyurdu. Azrail gitgide yaklaşıyor. Kendinizi hazırlayın" dedi.

title.text: The World Politics & The World's End

info.text: Addressing his guest, Mr. Metin Shadi, a prominent Cypriot businessman and politician, Mawlana discusses, "The World Politics & The World End - سياسة العالم و نهاية العالم". Mr. Shadi asks Mawlana about many of the contemporary issues that occupy and worry many of us.

Misafiri, Kıbrıs'ın önde gelen işadamı ve politikacılarından Metin Şadi Beye hitab eden Şeyh Efendi Hz, "Dünya Politikası ve Dünyanın Sonu" nu tartıştı. Metin Şadi Bey, Şeyh Efendi Hz'ne hepimizin aklını meşgul eden ve endişelendiren güncel sorunları sordu.
مخاطباً ضيفه ، السيد متين شادي ، رجل أعمال قبرصي وسياسي بارز ، مولانا ناقش ، " سياسة العالم ونهاية العالم " . السيد شادي سأل مولانا عن الكثير من المواضيع المعاصرة التي تُشغل وتُقلق الكثير منا .

The Muslim world is fragmented by the many factions that pull people out of the mainstream. One of these, "The Shi'a - Şialar - الشيعة ", Mawlana addresses his son-in-law Haji Feridun Bey, in a very short sohbat. He points to the basis of the Shi'a position that throws them off the mainstream and briefly explains their role in Islamic history.

الكثير من الإتجاهات والمذاهب في العالم الإسلامي يدفعون الناس بعيداً عن المنبع الحقيقي ولذلك تُقسًم العالم الإسلامي بنفسه . الليلة سنبث صحبتين اللتين حدد بهما مولانا موقفه بوضوح بإتجاه فرقتين قويتيًن وأشار الى المنبع الحقيقي . الأولى هي " الشيعة " . مُخاطباً صهره الحج فريدون أفندي ، في صحبة قصيرة جداً ، مولانا أشار الى الجوهر الذي يستند عليه الشيعة والذي يرميهم خارج المنبع الحقيقي . وكذلك شرح مولانا بإختصار حكمهم في التاريخ الإسلامي .

Everyday, between Asr and Maghrib Mawlana goes out for a dawriyya (a drive). Mawlana kindly allowed his cameraman to be with him in the car and to film, so that we all can enjoy "A Drive With Mawlana Around Lefke". We chose the piano to set the rhythm for the selected scenes. When we asked Mawlana about it, he said, "Güzel! I like the piano".

Şeyh Efendi Hz hergün İkindi ile Akşam arasında devriyeye çıkar. Hepimizin "Şeyh Efendi Hz ile Lefke'de Bir Devriye" nin zevkine varabilmemiz için, kameramanı arabada kendisiyle birlikte olup kameraya almasına izin verdi. Seçtiğimiz görüntüler için fon müziği olarak piyanoyu seçtik. Şeyh Efendi Hz'ne sorduğumuzda "Güzel! Piyanoyu severim" dedi.

كل يوم ما بين العصر والمغرب مولانا يخرج للدورية . مولانا تكرماً سمح للحج عبد الهادي ، مصوره ، ان يكون معه في السيارة للتصوير ، لكي نتمكن جميعاً من الإستمتاع " برحلة مع مولانا حول ليفكا " . إخترنا البيانو لضبط إيقاع المشاهد المختارة . عندما سألنا مولانا عنها ، قال ، " جيد ! أحب البيانو " ...
Today after breakfast, Mawlana gave an important announcement and instructions concerning, "The Coming Muharram - Gelen Muharrem - شهر محرّم القادم".
اليوم بعد الفطور ، مولانا أعطى إعلان وتعليمات مهمة في ما يتعلق ، ب " شهر محرًم القادم " .

Addressing his guests at the breakfast table, Mawlana explains that all aspects of modern life are geared towards depriving man of his humanity and finally destroying him. Mawlana says, "My Mission - رسالتي" is to bring Man back to his nature.
مخاطباً ضيوفه ، على طاولة الفطور ، مولانا شرح كيف ان كل مظاهر الحياة العصرية للإنسان هي موجهة نحو حرمان الإنسان من إنسانيته وبالنهاية تدميره ! مولانا قال " رسالتي" هي إعادة الإنسان الى طبيعته .

Addressing his guest, the English Professor, Mr. Michael Rose, Mawlana recalls the splendors of the British Kingdom. It is the majestic rule of the lions as opposed to the present, everywhere dominant, "Rule of The Donkeys! - حكم الحمير".

Misafiri İngiliz Profosör Micheal Rose'a hitab eden Şeyh Efendi Hz, İngiliz Krallığının görkemli ve ihtişamlı zamanlarını anımsadı. O zamanlar, şimdi her yerde hakim olan "Eşeklerin Hükmü!"nün aksine, aslanların heybetli yönetimi idi.
مُخاطباً ضيفه ، البروفوسور الإنكليزي ، السيد مايكل روز ، مولانا تذكر عظمة المملكة البريطانية . إنه الحكم العظيم للأسود على عكس الوضع الحالي ، " حكم الحمير " مسيطر في كل مكان .

title.text: We Were Led by a Lion

info.text: Mawlana says that our Tariqat is sohbat but there is no one today capable of either giving sohbat or understanding it! What has lowered the level of the people to this degree? What did we have before that we no longer have?.. "Başımızda Aslan Vardı - We Were Led By A Lion - كان يحكمنا سبعٌ ".

Şeyh Efendi Hz, "yolumuz sohbet yoludur lakin sohbet yapacak adamımız kalmadı, Sohbeti doğru anlayan adam da kalmadı" dedi. İnsanların kalitesini bu kadar düşüren nedir? Eskiden, şimdi olmayan neye sahiptik? "Başımızda Aslan Vardı".

مولانا قال طريقتنا الصحبة ، لكن لم يعد هناك من هو قادر على إعطاء الصحبة او فهمها !ما الذي يعيد خاصًية الناس التي إنخفضت كثيراً ؟ ماذا كان عندنا في السابق حيث أنه لم يعد عندنا منه شيء ؟ " كان يحكمنا سبعٌ ".

Many of our brothers and sisters who went on Ḥajj this year came to visit Mawlānā before going back to their homes. They came to have Mawlānā's blessings and they brought us here in Lefke the blessed scents of Al-Ḥaramayn Ash-Sharifayn. May Allāh ﷻ bless them and accept their Ḥajj.

الكثير من إخواننا وأخواتنا الذين ذهبوا الى الحج هذه السنة جائوا لزيارة مولانا قبل العودة الى منازلهم . قدِموا للحصول على بركة مولانا وأحضروا لنا هنا في ليفكا الروائح المباركة للحرمين الشريفين . الله يبارك فيهم ويقبل حجهم .
Mawlana speaks to his Russian guests.
Mawlana, with Sh. Mehmet, examined the book "Kalplerin Anahtarı - The Key of Hearts - مفتاح القلوب" and explained how Shaykhs in older times used to train their Dervishes to read such books.
مولانا ، مع الشيخ محمد ، تصفحوا كتاب " مفتاح القلوب " وشرح كيف ان المشايخ في الماضي كانوا يدربون مريديهم لقرأة هكذا كتب .

"Teach about the Realities - علِّموا الحقائق"."Teach About The Realities - علِّموا الحقائق ".. Mawlana  draws our attention to a puzzling question. He says there are so many new schools, curricula, fat text books, enforced school attendance, insistence on children remaining in school - yet - the children are uneducated and ignorant. They are devoid of both knowledge and understanding, and even of common sense. What is the cause? What is lacking in our  view of education?

" علموا الحقائق " ، مولانا جعلنا نواجه سؤال محيًر . مولانا قال أننا لا نُعًلم شبابنا . لكن عندما ننظر حولنا ، نرى الكثير من المدارس الجديدة ، الكثير من المناهج ، كتب كبيرة وضخمة والكثير من الإصرار على إرسال الأولاد الى المدارس وعلى إكمال تعليمهم ! لكن ما نراه أيضاً هو الجهل الكامل لهؤلاء الشباب . إنهم محرومين من العلم والفهم معاً ، وحتى في الكثير من الأحيان محرومين من المنطق ! إذا ماذا يحصل ؟ ما هو النقص في منظورنا العلمي ؟

Last Friday night, Mawlana explained some of the secret power in Surat Al-Kahf and how it can be used for protection. Mawlana asked Sh. Mehmet Effendi to prepare a book in which he collects such Fatwas and knowledge that is needed by people in their daily lives today.

في ليلة الجمعة السابقة ، شرح مولانا بعض القوة السرية في سورة الكهف وكيف يمكن إستعمالها للحماية . مولانا طلب من الشيخ محمد أفندي تحضير كتاب الذي يجمع فيه هكذا فتاوي وعلوم يحتاج إليها الناس في حياتهم اليومية اليوم ...
After listening to Surat Al-Kahf as he usually does every Friday, Mawlana gave some instruction for protection against Earthquakes or any fear.
After Eid, Mawlana met three Palestinian families and gave them good news, "An Opening Is Coming Soon - فَرَجٌ قريب". Mawlana explained about this year's special tejelli/manifestation on Arafat.
بعد العيد ، مولانا قابل ثلاث عائلات فلسطينية وأخبرهم أخبار سارًة ، " فرجٌ قريب " . مولانا شرح عن التجلي المميًز لهذه السنة على عرفات ...

title.text: Ahmad, the Servant of Shaykh Sharafuddin Hz.

info.text: Mawlana always mentions "Ahmad, the Servant of Shaykh Sharafuddin Hz." may Allah bless his soul and tells his funny stories.
مولانا يذكر دائماً " احمد ، خادم حضرة مولانا الشيخ شرف الدين " . رحمه الله وتحدث عن قصصه المرحة

Addressing an honorable guest from the Jordanian Royal Family, Mawlana tells the story of Grandshaykh's advice to their Grandfather, the late King Abdullah I, may Paradise be his abode. Mawlana says: "It is not something that I just witnessed but I wrote the letter with my own hand."

مخاطباً ضيوفه المشرفين من المملكة الأردنية ، مولانا روى قصة النصيحة التي أعطاها مولانا الشيخ لجدهم ، الملك الراحل عبد الله الأول ، الله يجعل مثواه الجنة . " إنه ليس شيء شهدته فقط ، لكنه شيء دونته بنفسي ! " قال مولانا ..
The Holy Hair of Prophet (sAs) Sakalı Şerif لحية السعادة

title.text: Mawlana on Arafat: The Spiritual Reality of Mawlana's Recent Illness
Şeyh Efendi Hz Arafat'ta, Yakın Zamandaki Rahatsızlığının Ruhani Hakikatı

info.text: Last Thursday Mawlana was not feeling well. At Asr time, he began shivering and trembling from fever. A doctor was called but could find nothing wrong with him except the fever. Until Fajr, Mawlana was sleeping and waking up but in a very strange heavy state. Then after Fajr he slept until 11 am. This was an unusually long but comfortable and deep sleep. Then Mawlana woke up and went down to Jumaa Prayer in the Mosque. Today Mawlana explained the spiritual reality of his recent illness.

الخميس الماضي مولانا لم يكن يشعر بتحسن . في وقت العصر ، بدأ يشعر بالرجفة والإرتعاش من الحمى . إستدعي الطبيب لكنه لم يجد أي شيء خطأ ما عدا الحمى . حتى الفجر ، مولانا كان ينام ويستيقظ لكن بوضع ثقيل وغريب جداً . ثم بعد الفجر نام الى الحادية عشر قبل الظهر . هذا كان نوم طويل وغيرعادي لكن مريح وعميق . ثم إستيقظ مولانا ونزل الى المسجد لتأدية صلاة الجمعة .

title.text: Instructions for the Day of Arafat

info.text: Today Mawlana announced that he has spiritual work, wazifa, to do for the next three days. He will not be receiving any visitors upstairs, especially women. Hajji Mehmet was appointed the doorkeeper for his father. No one will be permitted upstairs.
In this brief message Mawlana clearly indicates his choice of khalifah.
Mevlana kendi halifesini açık ve net olarak bildirmiştir.
في هذه الرسالة الموجزة مولانا يشير بوضوح اختياره لخليفته .

Mawlana spoke about the barakat of Mawlana's table and food and about the spiritual station of Shaykh Mehmet Effendi. Mawlana also gave instructions concerning "The Takbir of Eid" and said to make it known.
الليلة الماضية على العشاء ، مولانا تحدث عن بركة طاولة وطعام مولانا وعن المقام الروحاني للشيخ محمد أفندي . مولانا أيضاً أعطى تعليمات تخص " تكبير العيد " وقال ضعوها لكي تكون معروفة ....
In this short sohbat, Mawlana explains the reasons for all the earthquakes.

A group of 35 Spanish brothers and sisters, mostly new in Islam and tariqat, met with Mawlana yesterday. They all took Shahada and Bayat, MashaAllah! Mawlana advised them to "Run Back to Nature - عودوا إلى الطبيعة", and then asked them to sing for him.

مجموعة من الأخوة والأخوات الإسبان مؤلفة من خمسة وثلاثين شخص ، أكثريتهم دخلوا حديثاً الى الإسلام والى الطريقة ، بالأمس إجتمعوا بمولانا . جميعهم أدوا الشهادة وأخذوا بيعة ، ما شاء الله ! مولانا نصحهم ب" العودة الى الطبيعة " .. ثم طلب منهم التوقيع له ...

With his guest, Sh. Mostafa Alayli, Mawlana recalled some of the funny stories about "The People of Hums - Humus Ehli - أهل حمص" in Syria. Mawlana spent one year in Hums near the Maqam of Seyyidina Khalid Ibn el Walid. Mawlana loves and praises the people of Hums who are known for their funny stories.
مع ضيفه ، الشيخ مصطفى علايلي ، مولانا إستحضر بعض القصص المضحكة عن " أهل حمص " في سوريا . مولانا أمضى سنة في حمص قرب مفام سيدنا خالد إبن الوليد . مولانا يحب ويحترم أهل حمص المعروفين بقصصهم المضحكة .

title.text: The Expected Zuhur of Al Mahdi (as) on Arafat

info.text: Shaykh Hisham calls Mawlana from Mecca and Mawlana tells him about "The Expected Zuhur of al-Mahdi (as) on Arafat" this year.
الشيخ هشام إتصل بمولانا من مكة ومولانا أخبره عن " الظهور المتوقع للمهدي عليه السلام على عرفات " هذه السنة .

title.text: Şeyh Efendi Hz ile Keyifli Anlar

info.text: "Moments with Mawlana" is an example of Mawlana's sweetness and humbleness in dealing with his mureeds. MashaAllah! And May Allah grant him health and strength and long life.

"Şeyh Efendi Hz ile Keyifli Anlar" Şeyh Efendi Hz'nin müridlerine karşı olan davranışlarında ne kadar yumuşak ve mütevazi olduğunu gösteren bir örnek...Maşa Allah! Allah ona sağlık, kuvvet ve uzun ömür nasib etsin.
" لحظات مع مولانا " هي مثال على حلاوة وتواضع مولانا بالتعامل مع مريديه ... ما شاء الله ! الله يعطيه الصحة والعافية وطول العمر ...

title.text: Investment, Islamic Banking System and Baytu l Mal
‎الإستثمار هو أساس آلمصرف الإسلامي و بيت المال

info.text: Mawlana asked his grandson, Mehmet Nazim, about the meaning of "Istismar / Investment, Islamic Banking System and Baytu-l Mal". The basis of Islamic banking system is investment and not saving. Investment serves the nation while saving benefits the individual. The currency in Islam is gold, silver or copper and not paper. It is paper money that allowed man to indulge in all these bad habits that threw the world into the social economic and moral crises it suffers from now.

مولانا سأل حفيده ، محمد ناظم ، عن معنى " إستثمار " ، " نظام المصرف الإسلامي وبيت المال " . الإستثمار هو أساس النظام المصرفي الإسلامي وليس الإدخار . الإستثمار يخدم الأمة بينما الإدخار ينفع الفرد . العملة في الإسلام هي الذهب ، الفضة او النحاس وليس الورق . إنها العملة الورقية التي سمحت للإنسان ان ينغمس في كل هذه العادات السيئة التي رمت العالم في أزمات إجتماعية وإقتصادية وأخلاقية وبدأوا يعانونها منذ الآن ...

Last night Mawlana mentioned Egypt and the marvels and mysteries of that land. Mawlana asked how the land, that had been the seat of power and wealth and the Mother of Civilization, fell into the precarious conditions it finds itself in today? Then, after Fajr prayer, Mawlana explained about the soldiers of Egypt and the meaning of the people of "Egypt: Ahlu-r Ribat -  مصر أهل الرباط "

ليلة الأمس مولانا ذكر مصر وعجائب وغرائب هذا البلد . مولانا سأل كيف يمكن للبلد الذي كان مركز القوة والغنى وأم الحضارة ، ان يهبط الى حال غير مستقر والمعاناة من الآن ؟ ثم ، بعد صلاة الفجر ، مولانا فسر الحديث الذي يحكي عن جنود مصر ومعنى ان أهل " مصر : أهل الرباط " ...

title.text: Wird & Instructions for the Day of Arafat
Arefe Günü için Vird ve Talimatlar

info.text: Mawlana gave some instructions for the "Day of Arafat", for those who are on Hajj and Dhikr for those who did not go on Hajj.
مولانا أعطى بعض التعليمات ل " يوم عرفات " ، للذين هم موجودون في الحج وذكر للذين لم يذهبوا الى الحج .

One Turkish sister brought Mawlana an old book that he was looking for. Mawlana was very pleased with the book and said that it is "Acayip Kitap - An Amazing Book - كتاب قيم". Talking to his guests, Mawlana gave advice about the education of youngsters, explained the best time for night prayer, described the Barakat of the food in his place and how so many people can be fed twice daily, gave instructions about Zikr and answered a question about not seeing his face in dreams.

إحدى الأخوات الأتراك أحضرت لمولانا كتاب كان يبحث عنه . مولانا كان مسرور جداً بالكتاب وقال انه " كتاب قيًم ". متحدثاً الى ضيوفه ، مولانا أعطى نصيحة عن التعليم للشباب ، شارحاً أفضل وقت لقيام الليل ، واصفاً بركة الطعام عنده وكيف أنه يمكن للكثير من الناس ان يأكلوا مرتين في اليوم ، أعطى تعليمات عن الذكر وأجاب على سؤال عن عدم رؤية وجهه في المنامات ...

Mawlana generously gives valuable advice to the German, Pakistani and Spanish brothers and sisters who come up to see him. Mawlana reminds us all that "We're the Last Generation!" before the End of Times.

Mawlana sends "Salams to Our Prophet (sas) - Effendimize (sas) Selam" through his daughter, Haji Nazihe Hanim who is now in Madinah, with her family, ready for Hajj. Mawlana asks the Wahhabis two questions about the legitimacy of giving salams to Prophet (sas) that leave them and the Madhhab in pieces.

Are Allah's love for His creation and people's love for each other, related, and how? What can we learn from this relation to correct our own footsteps. Mawlana was talking again about Qadhafi's tragic end, and addressing his guest, Sh. Mustapha Alayli, at the breakfast table. Mawlana gave an important message to all presidents and leaders. He gave them the key to political peace and harmony, "The One Allah Loves - من أحبَّهُ اللهُ".

After watching the "Tragic Fate - Kötü Akıbet - سوء العاقبة" of such megalomaniacal figures as Qadhdhafi, Mawlana asked his guests at the dinner table about the value of all worldly possessions in the face of such a fate. Allah protect us! Without guidance, man is a toy in the hands of his ego and the devil. It is only in the mirror of the Murshid that man can see his reality and realize it.

Mawlana sees many people everyday, MashaAllah! They all seek to have a glimpse of his spiritual fountain and Mawlana is generous. "Advice to All - نصائح للجميع" gives some valuable advice about different issues.

Last week, a huge group - four full buses - of Ghazis, together with some members of their families, came to visit Mawlana. They were part of the Turkish army sent to Cyprus in the 1974-war. For some of them who had seen Mawlana then, this meeting was the second after almost 40 years! Mawlana made strong, beautiful du'aa for them and explained several important issues, "Gaziler İle - With The Ghazis - مع المحاربين القدامى".
"Tabiat Ile Barışalım - Let's Make Peace with Nature" is an awakening call to all the dangers, bad habits and complications that technology has introduced into our lives.

Watching the Sohbat, "With the Daghestanis - Gağıstaniler İle", is like enjoying Mawlana's company for 20 minutes with all its blessed energy and vivid humour. MashaAllah! Daghestan is the homeland of Grandshaykh, Abdullah Fayez Al-Daghestani Hz. and several Grandshaykh of the Naqshibendi Golden Chain.

مشاهدة الصحبة مع الداغستانيين هي مثل الاستمتاع بصحبة مولانا لمدة عشرون دقيقة بكل قوته المباركة ومرحه الدائم . ما شاء الله ! الداغستان هي وطن مولانا الشيخ عبد الله الفائز الداغستاني والعديد من مشايخ السلسلة النقشبندية الذهبية .

Mawlana sees so many people everyday, MashaAllah! "Maliki-l Mulk - مالك الملك" contains some important advice to different people. It carries another strong warning to the people of Antalya and those in their footsteps. It has the prayer new couples should make to have good children InshaAllah, an address to Bosnians, the value of the name Fatima and the Meaning of Maliki-l Mulk.

The cutting off of the heads and the turning over of the natural social pyramid through the introduction of Democracy is what paved the way for all the present fitnas. It provided the right atmosphere for man to learn and practise all the bad habits, and thus drawing the most vivid picture of the "Şeytanın Şeytanlığı -The Devilishness of the Devil".

If one cannot control oneself, how can one control others? Mawlana summarizes and explains the present political, and general human, paradox with this question. Last night, addressing the Arabs, Mawlana, in concise words, reminds them of the valuable things they forgot, or were made to forget, starting with "Bismillahi r-Rahmani r-Raheem - بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم".

Many brothers and sisters came up to say Goodbye to Mawlana before they leave. They asked him about marriage and about Hajj. Then Mawlana told them about the castle of Nelson and "A Spiritual Gathering After Midnight".

One man told Mawlana that he reads "Risale'i Nur". Mawlana said that the reading of a book can never substitute the guidance of a Shaykh. The Risale-i Nur collection is a six-thousand-page commentary on the Quran written by Bediuzzaman Said Nursi Hz., who was, as Mawlana related, a true Ottoman Alim and who had both real knowledge and sunuhat/inspiration and whose knowledge and writings are far beyond the scope of understanding of anyone in our times.

A group of four young ladies, all members of biblical schools and working as missionaries for peace at the UN, asked to meet with Mawlana. Mawlana accepted to see them. Setting an example of true tolerance and guidance, Mawlana spent almost half an hour with them and called them to "Keep Good Intention".

Last night Mawlana gave a strong address to the Turks asking them to take a lesson from the destruction in Antalya and to make tawba before the full blow of Allah's Wrath hits them. Though the address was to the Turks, the message is for all Muslims. They are all caught in the trap called "Modern life and Modern civilization", and now they have to find their way out, before it is too late. "Our Honor and Dignity - Irzimiz ve Şerefimiz - عرضنا و شرفنا"

Last night after `isha prayer Mawlana instructed H Mehmet to lead the people in making a dua for rain. They recited an ayat of the Quran over 1,000 stones that had been gathered from the sea earlier in the day. The ayat (42:28) was recited 70 times over each pebble. After fajr prayer H Mehmet threw all the stones back in the sea. The sea, which was very calm and still, began to get stormy and rough within a few minutes and then it rained.

title.text: Affarin to the Head of the Copts

info.text: Mawlana was informed about the response of the Head of the Coptic Church to the bloody clashes of yesterday and Mawlana said, "عفارم لرئيس الأقباط - Affarin to the Head of the Copts".

title.text: Halal Is Clear and Haram Is Clear

info.text: “Halal Is Clear and Haram Is Clear -الحلال بيّن و الحرام بيّن" conveys a very strong message. In our days, people are avoiding Shariat and running away from religion; and therefore are falling deeper and deeper into darkness. And those who call for Shari'at have from religion only its form leaving its meaning and essence out. And the cure? It is Mahdi (as).

"Meclis Mashurat An-Nabi (sas) - مجلس مشورة النبي" unveils the mistake that many Muslims make, whether intentionally or unintentionally, when they claim that Islam is Democratic. Asteghfirullah! There is no "Democracy" in Islam; but there is "Mashurat".

title.text: For Every Pharaoh There Is a Moses a.s.
Her firavun için bir Musa (a.s.) vardır

info.text: An Important Message From Mawlana Shaykh Nazim to The Copts of Egypt: Mawlana watched the Copts' fury in the streets of Cairo last night and the bloody clashes with the Egyptian troops. Mawlana was very unhappy with what he watched on TV. After Fajr prayer Mawlana gave a strong address, but this time to the Copts and all the Christian brothers in the Muslim world. "كل فرعون له موسى - For Every Pharaoh There Is a Moses - Her Firavun İçin Bir Musa Vardı"

رسالة هامة من مولانا الشيخ ناظم إلى أقباط مصر شاهد مولانا ليلة البارحة غضب الأقباط في شوارع القاهرة والمناوشات الدموية مع القوات المصرية. وكان مولانا مستاء جدا لما شاهده على التلفاز.أدلى مولانا بخطاب قوي بعد صلاة الفجر، لكنه كان موجها في هذه المرة إلى الأقباط وإلى جميع الإخوة المسيحيين في العالم الإسلامي...وعنوان خطابه "كل فرعون له موسى

title.text: The Way of the Seal of Prophets (sas)

info.text: "The Way of the Seal of the Prophets (sas)" should be the way of all Muslims. Addressing a group of old and new Muslims, Mawlana points to True Way and gives Bayat.
" طريق خاتم النبياء " يجب ان تكون طريق كل المسلمين . مخاطباً مجموعة من المسلمين القدامى والجدد ، مولانا أشار الى الطريق الصحيح وأعطى بيعة ..

A group of Turkish young men were eager to kiss Mawlana's hand and get his blessings. Mawlana gave them important advice. Then, one of them asked a question. His question is one that keeps imposing itself on the minds of many of us; whether or not we have the ability to verbalize it or the courage to pose it. "Niçin - Why - لماذا"

"Tanzimat Fermani" was the first step in the decline of the Great Ottoman Empire  leading to its final breakdown. This Ferman stated the equality between Muslims and non-Muslims regardless of their religion. This opened the door to the secularization of Turkey and was completed with the declaration of the Secular Turkish State. This was  an unprecedented step  that contradicted, and even negated, the glorious history and tradition of the Turkish people. Because of the possibly sensitive nature of this sohbat we asked Mawlana's permission today before announcing it.

Last night Mawlana gave an unexpected English Sohbat. He got out his magnifying glass to illustrate how man in his pettiness can justify his false sense of self-greatness. "Through a Magnifying Glass", Mawlana showed the difference between the sons of Adam and Shaytan. Mawlana showed the true essence of human greatness to which man, despite all his grandiosity and endless endeavours to assert himself, is blind. Mawlana explained the meaning of 'fana fillah - annihilation in Allah' and revealed the seed of all evil and human misery. Mawlana asked for this sohbat to be translated into as many languages as possible.

In half-serious, half-joking tone, Mawlana discusses with H. Feridun, his son-in-law, the possible forms of punishment. "Punishment - Ceza" is the main tool by which governments can treat the wildness and the irresponsibility of its subjects. The main point about punishment is not merely taking revenge from someone for committing a certain crime, but to teach the individual to carry the consequences of his actions and forbid the society from committing such forbidden actions. In all Divine Laws, Punishment is an essential tool to develop the individual and clean the society, and not to destroy or damage.

Some Egyptians and Syrians asked about: the constitution, the conflicting political parties, the lawful ruler and the signs of the end of times. They also asked, 'Since Mawlana always calls for the rule of Shari'at, does this mean accepting the rule of Ikhwan (Muslim Brotherhood) or Salafis, who are the only powerful voices calling for Shari'at in the political arena?' Mawlana gave clear answers to all these questions and an important warning: "Keep the Surviving Group - إلزموا الفرقة الناجي".

title.text: The Lions of the Beloved's (sas) Nation

info.text: In the car, during the usual afternoon drive to the mountain, Mawlana addressed his honorable guests, "The Lions of the Beloved's (sas) Nation - Habibin İmmetinin Aslanları - أسود أمة الحبيب".

After the sohbat, "Tebligat", many people send to ask Mawlana what they should do in these difficult days. Today after Fajr prayer, Mawlana shortly explained how difficult these days are and said he will explain more later "Banu Asfar - بنو أصفر"
Mawlana speaks about Sayyidina Musa - Prophet Moses (as) and some of the unique qualities of other Prophets too, "Sual ve Cevap - A Question and an Answer - سؤال و جواب"

title.text: A Waterwheel Without Water Cannot Turn
السا قية بلا ماء لا تدور

info.text: Mawlana recites the names of the Daghestani Grandshaykhs of the Naqshibandis to some of his Turkish guests whose parents had come from Daghestan. They asked about the present conditions. But if you get rid of the Kings and replace the head with the feet, then what kind of results should you expect? Mawlana said, "A Waterwheel Without Water Cannot Turn! - Susuz Değirmeni Dönmez!"

title.text: And They from Every Elevation Descend (21:96)
Nihayet Ye’cûc ve Me’cûc açılıp da her tepeden saldırdıkları (21:96)

info.text: After Fajr Prayer, Mawlana explained another important sign of the end of times, "And They from Every Elevation Descend (21:96) - من كل حدب ينسلون".

title.text: At the Door of Armageddon, a Warning

info.text: Last night Mawlana described the three parties into which the Muslim army will split during the Battle of Wadi el-Umuq, in the big war of Armageddon. The entering of some pieces of the Russian navy to the Mediterranean Sea through Turkey is a big sign of the coming close of such events. Mawlana gave important instructions for protection.

title.text: Egypt in the Times of Fitna

info.text: Again Mawlana addresses the Egyptians but the warning includes all Arabs and Muslims. They complain they cannot find a good ruler but that is because they have the wrong system of government. They run after Satanic ideas like democracy and nationalism and they harm and destroy themselves and each other. Yet Egyptians should be grateful to their Lord.

Mawlana asked Imam Abdur Rahman to recite the holy verse: "He whom Allah guides is the (rightly) guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a Waliyyan Murshidan (18:17) - من يهد الله فهو المهتد و من يضلل فلن تجد له ولياً مرشداً". This Quranic verse clarifies the distinction between the "rightly-guided" and the "mis-guided" ones. Not having a Waliyyan Murshidan is a sign for being from the misguided ones. May Allah reward our Shaykh for showing to us what is "Waliyyan Murshidan".

Prophet (sas) complains to his Lord that his nation has left "The Quran (a thing) Abandoned - القرآن مهجوراً" And when this Munajat / prayer is made by S. Mahdi, the order for his Zhuhur / appearance will come. This Sohbat also contains an important statement of the belief of Ahli-Sunnat concerning the life and death of Prophet (sas).

Some time ago, a sister brought her son, a young man, to get some advice from Mawlana. She was concerned about his bad choice of friends and his irresponsible way of living. Mawlana explained the importance of training our children to have self-control by not giving them everything they crave.

title.text: I Am Ashamed in Front of My Lord

info.text: In the short sohbat "Rabbimden Utanırım - I Am Ashamed in Front of My Lord - أستحيي من ربي" Mawlana contemplates the meanings of 'exceedingly unjust' and 'excessively ignorant' nature of human beings.

Two Egyptian brothers asked Mawlana about the complicated political situation in Egypt and how people cannot find the good ruler, they long for. Mawlana explained the reasons for this deadlock in two ways. Historically, the Egyptians have committed a huge mistake, and betrayed their own history and tradition. They turned "the Kingdom of Egypt", its title in all Holy books and throughout history, to a Republic! Yet, according to the Divine Wisdom, as expressed in the holy Hadith, we are all inevitably in "The Age of Tyrants - Cebaların Zamanı - عهد الجبابرة".

title.text: Open the Doors of Your Spiritual Being

info.text: "Open the Doors of Your Spiritual Being" How? May we always be by our door and never lose it. May Allah Keep us with our Shaykh here and Hereafter!
"Ibrahim Al-Adham - إبراهيم الأدهم" is a king and a great saint. His life story teaches us an invaluable lesson about the meaning and the purpose of our existence in this world.

title.text: Birth Is in the Here, Mirth Is in the Hereafter
النشأة في الدنيا و النشوة في الآخرة

info.text: "Birth Is in the Here, Mirth Is in the Hereafter - Dünyada Neşet, Ahirette Neşvet - النشأة في الدنيا و النشوة في الآخرة" shows the value of each of the two worlds. But man is unjust or mindless. He gives what is for the Eternal to the Temporal and suffers in both worlds.

What is the benefit of all the education we could have if it does not help us answer the question, "Who Are You? - Sen Kimsin? - من أنت؟"? Our education - like all the aspects of our lives today - is as valuable as the paper money in our hands!
Surat Al-Kahf, to be read on Fridays - سورة الكهف، تقرأ يوم جمعة

In the Sohbat, "İslamın Güneşi - The Sun of Islam - شمس الإسلام", Mawlana carries on with explaining the factors that, due to the Muslims' heedlessness, effectively worked to bring down the Muslim world to the state it suffers from now. Mawlana points out some historical facts concerning Christianity and Islam!

title.text: O Saleh, if You Were from Arabs and if You Were a Muslim
‎يا صالح إن كنت عربياً و إن كنت مسلماً

info.text: Every night Mawlana watches the world news. When he saw all those killed and wounded in Yemen, Mawlana was very angry with Arabs. He made a strong Du'aa for the innocent ones suffering in Yemen, Syria and everywhere under oppression and oppressors. In the morning, Mawlana recited the Ayat, "أفحكم الجاهلية يبغون و من أحسن من الله حكماً لقومٍ يوقنون - So is it the rule of ignorance which they desire? And who can be better than Allah in judgement for a people who are certain" (5:50) several times: and then pointed to the camera to be switched on.

title.text: A Great Mission for A Great Nation

info.text: Yesterday Mawlana gave good news to German brothers and assigned a very important mission for the German nation.

Many people ask for what is "beyond' or "above" or "more than" Islam; as if they have finished with Islam already; or, as if they have more than what Islam offers! Asteghfirullah! In tonight's Sohbat, Mawlana clearly states, "What Lies Beyond Islam". Mawlana also explains the factors that, due to the Muslims' heedlessness, effectively worked to bring down the Muslim world to the state it suffers from now!
Good News together with a permission for Seclusion/Khalwat were given to Spanish brothers. "The Flag of Mahdi (as) - راية المهدي عليه السلام".

title.text: Make It Easy, Do Not Complicate

info.text: After Fajr prayer, Mawlana related the Hadith: "Make it easy, do not make it difficult; say good things, do not repel - Kolaylaştırınız, güçleştirmeyiniz; müjdeleyiniz, nefret ettirmeyiniz - يسِّروا و لا تعسِّروا، بشِّروا و لا تنفِّروا" Mawlana said that this Hadith should be written with letters of gold. In it lies the cause for human troubles and the key to solving them.

A Turkish researcher asked Mawlana several interesting questions that brought some important answers from Mawlana. He asked about the discrepancies between Naqshibandi books in relating some details in Mawlana's life. He asked also about the Shaykhs in the Golden Chain and the ignorant criticisms against some tariqat practices.

title.text: The Permission for Haj This Year

info.text: Today after Zuhr prayer, Mawlana said that last night he received news about this year's Haj.

title.text: What Is the Name of the Prophet of China?

info.text: The question that was asked to Mawlana earlier and which Mawlana posed to all religious authorities, inside and outside of Islam, "What Is the Name of the Prophet of China? - من هو نبي أهل الصين؟". And while answering this difficult question, Mawlana explains and clarifies several important points related to this subject.
He also gave the secret cure for hearts.
Mawlana gave important instructions about travelling.

After Fajr prayer, Mawlana explained some of the reasons for the moral and social corruption in Turkey, Cyprus, and for that matter, in the whole Arabic and Islamic World. "Everyone Ran to the Capital! - Herkes Şehire Koştu!"

The last night before His Royal Highness Raja Ashman left, Mawlana gave him this important address. "You did not just come here to attend the wedding. No! There are instructions from GrandShaykh for you and that is why you were summoned here!"

Addressing his eldest grandsons, Mawlana explains the plight of modern Man, the reasons that led to it. Then Mawlana's honorable guest, Raja Ashman, comes in the room so Mawlana continues the sohbat in English, "The Steps of the Devil - خطوات الشيطان". We have divided this sohbat in two parts: an Arabic part one and an English part two. We apologize for the outdoor noise in the Arabic video.

Addressing his eldest grandsons, Mawlana explains the plight of modern Man, the reasons that led to it. Then Mawlana's honorable guest, Raja Ashman, comes in the room so Mawlana continues the sohbat in English, "The Steps of the Devil - خطوات الشيطان".We have divided this sohbat in two parts: an Arabic part one and an English part two. We apologize for the outdoor noise in the Arabic video.
The Nikah of Mawlana's grandson, the eldest son of Hj. Rukeya Sultan and Hj. Feridun, took place today in the morning.
In Eid and before Eid, Mawlana saw so many people. Mawlana explained to some of our Pakistani brothers living in Nelson about the holy places in England.

title.text: With the Students of Adnan Hoja

info.text: In Eid and before Eid, Mawlana saw so many people. Some of Adnan Hoja's students asked Mawlana about Sultanate and about Seyyidina Al-Mahdi.
In the morning, Mawlana explained to Haji Feridun, his son-in-law, that there are "Two Types of Mind - İki Türlü Akıl Var". Haji Rukeya Sultan filmed that sohbat.

Last week the popular Egyptian actor, Ahmad Fishawy, visited Mawlana. He spent two weeks in Mawlana's company. The day he was leaving, Mawlana praised him and pointed out for him the way and the goal for his work and endeavor. "داعية إلى الله - The Visit of al-Fishawy"

title.text: Follow Him ﷺ and Come to Me ﷻ
Onu ﷺ Takip Edin ve Bana ﷻ Gelin
اتبعوه صلى الله عليه وسلم وتعالوا اليً

info.text: Allāh ﷻ is warning, O Mankind, you left the ways leading to Paradise and you are following shayṭān people leading you to endless miseries, to make your own punishment. But now they are running to ‘Īd prayer and making Takbīr for Me ﷻ. I forgive them for the honour of My Beloved ﷺ.

Allah ﷻ uyarıyor, "Ey insanoğlu, Cennet yolunu bıraktınız ve sizi sonsuz ıstıraba sürükleyen insan şeytanlarını takip ediyorsuz, kendi cezanızı kendiniz hazırlıyorsunuz. Fakat şimdi bayram namazına koşturup Bana ﷻ tekbir getiriyorsunuz. Ben onları Habibim'in ﷺ hürmetine affederim."

الله يحذر ، أيها البشر ، لقد تركتم الطرق المؤدية إلى الجنة وتتبعون أهل الشيطان الذين يقودونكم إلى البؤس الذي لا نهاية له ، لمعاقبتكم. ولكنهم الآن يركضون إلى صلاة العيد ويكبرونني . أغفر لهم إكراما لحبيبي ﷺ.

Mawlana carries on with the theme he started in the Ramazan Sohbetleri. Mawlana warns the people against the bad actions, attitudes, beliefs or habits, which they are so used to that they no longer are able to see the evil in them. But in this last one of the Ramazan Sohbetleri, Mawlana says that this sohbat is also a "Bayramlık - Eid Present".
In two separate sohbats, Mawlana gave important advice to Palestinians, and all Arabs and Muslims.
Ramazan Sohbetleri: Mawlana gives a strong warning to all those who run after their egoistic desires and not distinguish between Halal and Haram. "Adam Ol! - Be a Man - كن رجلاً".

Ramazan Sohbetleri: People give unlimited freedom to their egos thinking that if they can do everything they long for or they egos ask, they will reach "Güzel Hayat - Good Life - حياة طيبة"; until they discover that it is all an illusion. But then it is too late!

title.text: Your Imam Is From Among You

info.text: In two separate sohbats, Mawlana gave important advice to Palestinians, and all Arabs and Muslims.

Prophet of China! A new Muslim from China who seeks to call more people to Islam asked about the name of the Prophet sent to Chinese people. Mawlana said he has the answer but posses the question to all the religious authorities not only in Islam but also in Christianity and Judaism.
Who is Man? If you knew his honor there would be no hurting no killing.
İnsanoğlu kimdir? Onun şerefini bilseniz kimseye zarar vermek yada öldürmek diye bir şey kalmaz.
من هو الإنسان ؟ إذا كنت تعرف تكريمه لن يكون هناك أي أذى وأي قتل .

On another beautiful afternoon Mawlana spent time sitting with the ladies after Juma’a. He asked them if they were happy and when they replied with a resounding “Yes, Mawlana” he prayed that they be ladies of Paradise. He toured the kitchens and let his eye cast its blessings on everyone and everything on his way.

Başka bir cuma akşamüzeri Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Cuma Namazından sonra oturup bayan müritler ile vakit geçirdi. Mutlu musunuz diye sorduğunda hep bir ağızdan 'Evet Şeyh Efendi' diye cevap verdiler, Şeyh Efendi Cennetlerin Hanımefendileri olmaları için dua etti. Mutfağı ziyaret etti ve orada gördüğü herşeye, herkese bereketini verdi.

بعد ظهر يوم آخر جميل قضى مولانا الوقت جالسا مع السيدات بعد صلاة الجمعة . سألهن إذا كن سعداء وعندما أجبن بصوت مدوي "نعم ، مولانا" دعا أن يكن من سيدات الجنة . قام بجولة في المطابخ وجعل عينيه تلقي ببركته على كل شخص وكل شيء في طريقه .
Let us be of the people of Bliss (Ahli-s Safa) not of the people who are cut off (Ahli-l Jafa).
Bizleri mutlu insanlardan (Ahli-s Safa) kıl, Cefa ehliden (Ahli-l Jafa) değil. Bu zamanın insanları Sefa ve Cefanın nereden olduğunu bilmiyor. Sefa Peygamber Efendimiz SAS ayağının altındadır.
دعونا نكون من أهل الصفاء ، ليس من أهل الجفاء . الناس اليوم لا يعرفون أين الصفاء وأين المعاناة . الصفاء تحت نعل النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم .
Mawlana discloses some of the secrets of the Basmala Sharif.
Şeyh Efendi hazretleri Besmelei Şerifin bazı sırlarını açıklar.
مولانا يكشف عن بعض أسرار البسملة الشريفة .
In this beautiful morning sohbat Mawlana reminds us to keep our eyes on the jewel, the essence of things; that Allah is all there is to ask for.
Bu güzel sabah sohbetinde Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri gözümüzü mücevherler, nesnelerin kokuları üzerinde tutmamız, üzere uyardı, ki Allah her isteyeceklerimiz için orada hazırdır.
في هذا الصباح الجميل صحبة مولانا تذكرنا بابقاء عيوننا على الجوهر ، جوهر الأشياء ، حيث أن الله ما لنا سواه .
Allah is Beauty and He loves Beauty. Be beautiful and make the world more beautiful. Plant trees and sweet smelling bushes and make the earth green.
Allah güzelliktir ve güzelliği sever. Güzel olunuz ve dünyayı daha güzel yapınız. Ağaç ve güzel kokulu bitkiler dikiniz ve dünyayı yeşillendirin.
الله جميل ويحب الجمال . كن جميلاً واجعل الدنيا أكثر جمالا . ازرع الأشجار والشجيرات ذات الرائحة الحلوة واجعل الأرض خضراء .
Mawlānā encouragingly supplicates in respect to doing, being and working for Allāh ﷻ, wherein lies man’s benefit.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri cesurca yakararak dua etti, Allah için çalışmak ve olmaya saygı için, ki orada insanlığın faydası yatmaktadır.
مولانا يشجع على الفعل ، والعمل في سبيل الله ، حيث تكمن فائدة الإنسان .
Mawlana remembers the old times and people in Famagusta and he hopes that those mosques will be restored again for prayer and dhikr.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Mağusadaki eski zamanları ve insanları hatırlar, umut eder ki ordaki Camiler tadil edilip namaz ve zikire açılır.
مولانا يتذكر الأيام الماضية والناس في فاماغوستا ويأمل أن تعود تلك المساجد مرة أخرى لتأدية الصلاة والذكر .
