Mawlana makes a short dua in which in the beginning he makes the order to “Give” and in the end comments that there is a lot of advice to give but no one to take.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri kısa bir dua etti, bu duanın başında 'Ver' diye emretti ve sonunda tavsiye edilecek çok şeyin olduğu fakat edilecek kimsenin olmadığı yorumunu getirdi.
مولانا دعا دعاء قصير والذي في بدايته أمر "أعطي" وفي النهاية علًق أن هناك الكثير من النصائح يمكن أن تُعطى ولكن لا أحد يأخذ .
Mawlana makes du’a and announces that the heavens celebrated the birth of the Prophet today and that the festivities began in Egypt.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri dua etti, göklerin Peygamber Efendimiz SAS'in doğum gününü bugün kutladığını ve kutlamaların Mısırda başladığını duyurdu.
مولانا دعا وأعلن أن السماوات تحتفل بمولد النبي اليوم وأن الإحتفالات بدأت في مصر .

Come celebrate the Blessed night of the Prophet’s birth, Mawlid an Nabi, with Mawlana. There are salawats with Imam Abdur Rahman, fireworks, Hadra in the park and a visit with the blessed hair of the Prophet.

Gel ve Peygamber Efendimizin bereketli doğum günününü, Mevlit Kandilini Şeyh Efendi İle kutla. İmam Abdurrahman ile Salavatlar okunacak, havai fişek gösterisi olacak, parkta Hadra yapılacak ve Peygamber Efendimizin Sakalı Şerifi ziyaret edilecek.
تعالوا واحتفلوا بليلة مولد النبي المباركة ، مع مولانا . هناك صلوات مع الإمام عبد الرحمن ، وألعاب نارية ، حضرة في الساحة وزيارة للحية السعادة .
Mawlana announces that this Mawlid is like no other.
Şey Efendi Hazretleri açıkladı ki, Bu Mevlit Kandili diğerlerine hiç benzemez.
مولانا يعلن أن هذا المولد ليس كأي مولد آخر .
Mawlana has such adab that never in his life did he look to check if the stones about the Maqam of Hala Sultan are really floating or not. Have Adab, give to who asks and do not fear.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretlerinin öylesine bir edebi var ki, hayatında hiçbir zaman Hala Sultan Hazretlerinin Makamı üzerindeki taşların, gerçekten havada durduğunu kontrol etmek için hiçbir zaman bakmadı. Edebli olunuz, isteyenlere veriniz ve korkmayınız.
مولانا لديه مثل هذا الأدب حيث أنه لم ينظر في حياته للتحقق مما إذا كانت الحجارة حول مقام هالة سلطان تطفو حقا أم لا . تأدب ، أعطِ لمن يسأل ولا تخف .
Man was created weak. He can only learn and do what he can. The ocean of oceans cannot be described with a dot.
İnsan zayıf yaratıldı. Sadece yapabileceklerini öğrenir ve yapar. Okyanuslar okyanusu sadece bir nokta ile tarif edilemez.
وخلق الإنسان ضعيفا . يمكنه أن يتعلم فقط ويفعل ما يستطيع . محيط المحيطات لا يمكن وصفه بنقطة .
Mawlānā gives a beautiful du‘ā’ for the opening of the month of Mawlid.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Mevlit ayının başlangıcı için güzel bir dua etti.
مولانا يدعو دعاء جميل لبداية شهر المولد .
Mawlānā talks about the heaviest day of the year and praises his daughter and his grandson.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri yılın en ağır günü hakkında konuşuyor ve kızı ile torununu övüyor.
مولانا يتحدث عن أثقل يوم من أيام السنة وأشاد بإبنته وحفيده .
Give, give, even if it is like an ant compared to a mountain. Give for Allah and don't be afraid.
Bir dağ ile karşılaştırıldığında bir karınca gibi olsa bile, ver, ver. Allah için verin ve korkmayın.
أعطِ ، أعطِ حتى لو كان مثل نملة مقارنة بالجبل . أعطِ لله ولا تخف .
Give and don't fear. Be for Allah.
Verin ve korkmayın. Allah için olun.
أعطِ ولا تخف . كن لله .
Ramazan Sohbetleri: "Arayan Bulur - Whoever Seeks, Finds - طلبنا وجدنا"

Ramazan Sohbetleri: "If We Are Muslims, … - Biz Müslümansak, ... " then we have to listen to this sohbat and follow Mawlana's instructions and really be careful. It is very uncommon that Mawlana gives such clear-cut instructions like the ones in thus sohbat.

title.text: It is as though it was it

info.text: Professor Sa'adudin, working in Nasa, asked Mawlana about the abundance of water in other galaxies and the possibility of life there. Mawlana quoted the Quranic verse, the answer of the Queen of Sheba to S. Solomon, "Kaannahu Huwa - كأنّه هو - It is as though it was it" (27:42). In this holy verse lie the keys for human understanding. Mawlana also gave an important explanation of the Quranic verse, "Waannahu huwa rabbu ashshiAAra - و أنّه هو رب الشِعرى - And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius" (53:49)

A Message to Chileans and All: The 33 Chilean miners who, with Mawlana's barakat, were rescued last year, gathered together during Ramadan and asked Mawlana for a message. Mawlana gave this important message and asked that it be put online tonight. 'Two Calls to Oneness'.

title.text: Do Not Be Deceived by Dunya

info.text: Everything in this world is passing. Everything is between two points; and whatever has a beginning has an end. So "Dünyaya Aldanma! - Do Not Be Deceived by Dunya! - و لا تغررنك الدنيا"

title.text: The King of Darknesses and His Realms

info.text: How is it possible that a man can choose Darkness over Light? But this is the predominate choice of the men of the 20th and 21st centuries. The Muslims obey the non-Muslims and follow "The King of Darknesses & His Realms - Karanlıklar Kralı ve Diyarı - ظلمات الطاغوت".

Nasıl mümkün olabilir ki insan karanlığı aydınlığa tercih eysin. Fakat bu 20. ve 21. YY insanının ağır basan seçimidir. Müslümanlar, Müslüman olmayanlara tabi olup 'Karanlıklar Kralı ve Diyarını' takip ediyorlar.
كيف يمكن للإنسان أن يختار الظلام على النور ؟ ولكن هذا هو الخيار السائد للناس في القرنين العشرين والواحد والعشرين . المسلمون يطيعون الكفار ويتبعون " ظلمات الطاغوت ".
The prominent journalist Doğan Harman interviewed Mawlana last week. We divided the one-hour interview into two parts. One translated and the other not.

title.text: To All Those Not Fasting Ramadan
لكل الذين لا يصومون شهر رمضان

info.text: "Ramazan Orucu Tutmayanlara - To All Those Not Fasting Ramadan". You are free, but finally you will have no one to blame but yourselves! Mawlana tells humorous stories about what might happen to those who do not fast and those who continue to smoke.

Ramazan Orucu Tutmayanlara. Serbestsiniz, fakat sonunda suçlamak için kendinizden başkasını bulamayacaksınız! Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Oruç tutmayan ve sigara içmeyenlere ne olabileceği hakkında mizahi hikayeler anlatır.
" لكل الذين لا يصومون شهر رمضان ". أنتم أحرار ، ولكن في النهاية لن تلوموا أحد ولكن أنفسكم ! مولانا يروي قصص فكاهية حول ما يمكن أن يحدث لأولئك الذين لا يصومون وأولئك الذين يستمرون في التدخين .

Mawlana addresses a very important point that could determine the present and the future of any country. What is the relationship between the civilian and the military institutions within any government? How was it in the past? How is it in the present? And how should it be? What are the consequences of such a relationship to the stability and prosperity of any country? Mawlana said that this sohbat is an address not only to the Turks, but also to all Arabs and all Muslims, "Ordu Hümayun - اردوي همايون".

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bir ülkenin şimdiki halini ve geleceğini belirleyebilecek çok önemli bir noktaya değinir. Herhangi bir hükümette siviller ve askeri kurumlar arasındaki ilişki nedir? Geçmişte nasıldı? Şimdi nasıl? Ve nasıl olmalı? Herhangi bir Ülkenin istikrar ve refahı için böyle bir ilişkinin önemi nedir? Şey Efendi Hazretleri bu sohbetin sadece Türkler için değil, aynı zamanda bütün Araplar ve Müslümanlar için olduğunu söyledi. "Ordu Hümayun - اردوي همايون".

مولانا يعالج نقطة هامة جدا قد تحدد حاضر ومستقبل أي بلد . ما هي العلاقة بين المدنيين والمؤسسات العسكرية داخل أي حكومة ؟ كيف كانت في الماضي ؟ وكيف هي في الوقت الحاضر؟ وكيف ينبغي أن تكون ؟ ما هي النتائج المترتبة على مثل هذه العلاقة في تحقيق الاستقرار والازدهار في أي بلد ؟ يقول مولانا أن هذه الصحبة هي خطاب ليس فقط للأتراك ، ولكن أيضا لجميع العرب وجميع المسلمين ، " جيوش السلطان ".

Mawlana recited the Holy Hadith, "السلطان ظل الله في الأرض", and explained a point that puzzles many researchers in the realm of political philosophy. How can one man rule a whole nation or nations? What makes the people accept and obey? What allows monarchies to come about and be effective?

title.text: Use New Methods of Education and Teach People Good Things

info.text: Last month, Mawlana asked professor Abdullah, a French professor of physics, to find new methods and new programs that would arouse the youngsters' interest in their history and in the realities around and in themselves. "Use New Methods of Education and Teach People Good Things".

title.text: A Warning from the People of Heavens

info.text: In the presence of his royal highness and blessed lineage, our honorable Prince, Mawlana points out the standards which a "Good King" has to meet in order to deserve his title. Mawlana recites an Ayat, a holy verse, that carries a special address to kings and all rulers. It refers to the tremendous weight of the responsibility that lies on the shoulders of those in command and which their subjects are free from. Mawlana asked for this important sohbat to delivered because it carries "A Warning from the People of Heavens - تحذير من أهل الملكوت" to all kings and rulers.

Yesterday a Sharif, a descendent from the purest line of Prophet's family, a Prince came to visit Mawlana. He brought as a present the "Tefsir of al-Quran al-Karim" by Seyyidi Abdul Qadir al-Jilani. Mawlana explained about Tafsir (Interpretation of Quran).

Mawlana makes fun of the term "Men of Religion" which was invented to replace the traditional terms such as, Hoja or Imam. This new title is devoid of meaning and value, and the people who carry it resemble the name. Both are form without substance.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri İmam veya Hoca gibi geleneksel terimler yerine icat edilen ‘Din Adamı’ terim ile dalga geçti. Bu ünvan mana ve değerden yoksundur, bu ünvanı ve adı taşıyan insanlar yine bu ada benzerler. Her ikisi de yeri olmayan terimlerdir.
مولانا يسخر من مصطلح "رجال الدين" الذي اخترع ليحل محل المصطلحات التقليدية مثل ، خوجة أو إمام . هذا اللقب الجديد يخلو من المعنى والقيمة ، والناس الذين يحملونه يشبهون الاسم . كلاهما شكل بلا جوهر .

Mawlānā speaks about a nation that has cut its connections to its great historical and cultural roots. It stays confined within the limits of a made-up contemporary consciousness and is incapable of going beyond itself or of reaching a true understanding. Mawlānā explains his use of “subtleties – لطائف” and the order to do so from the Qur’ān. Mawlānā is speaking to Jubbeli Ahmet Hoja in this way and the Hoja understands the real meaning.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Muhteşem Tarihi ve Kültür kökleri ile olan bağlantısını kesen bir millet hakkında konuştu. Bu, uydurma çağdaş bilincin içerisinde sınırlı kalmak ve kendini geliştirip gerçek anlayışa ulaşmakta aciz kalmaktır. Şeyh Efendi Latifeyi kullanışını ve Kurana göre bunun sırasını açıklar. Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri, Cübbeli Ahmet Hocaya bu şekilde konuşur ve Hoca bunların gerçek manasını anlar.

" لطيفة " مولانا يتحدث عن الأمة التي قطعت صلاتها بجذورها التاريخية والثقافية الكبرى . تبقى محصورة ضمن حدود الوعي المعاصر الوهمي وغير قادرة على تجاوز نفسها أو الوصول إلى الفهم الحقيقي . مولانا يشرح كيفية استخدامه" لطائف" والأمر لفعل ذلك من القرآن الكريم . مولانا يتحدث إلى الخوجة أحمد جبالي بهذه الطريقة والخوجة يفهم المعنى الحقيقي .
Yesterday Mawlana saw many people and gave many short nice talks in Turkish and English. We will present some of these important talks. "Advice - Nasiha - نصيحة".

"Sultan Eyüp Hz - (أبو أيوب الأنصاري (رضي الله عنه - Sultan Abu Ayub al-Ansary". The Mufti of Istanbul is discouraging people from visiting the tomb of the great Sahabi and the spiritual Sultan of Istanbul, Hz. Abu Ayub al-Ansary (ra), claiming that such a visit has no value. The mosque of Hz. Ayub is closed throughout the Holy month of Ramadan because they say that it is "under renovation". This is a situation that breaks the hearts of true Muslims who seek nearness to their Prophet (sas) especially in this holy month by means of such a visit. This is not unique to Turkey or Istanbul. It happens in all Muslim countries wherever a tomb of a sahabi or a relative of the Prophet (sas) or that of a big saint, exists. Mawlana answers them and urges Hoja Jubbeli Ahmad and all Imams to speak up and stop such fitna.

"Sultan Eyüp Hz - (أبو أيوب الأنصاري (رضي الله عنه - Sultan Abu Ayub al-Ansary" İstanbul Müftüsü bu büyük Sahabe ve İstanbul'un Manevi Sultanı, Hz. Abu Ayub al-Ansary (ra), hazretlerinin Türbesini ziyaret etme konusunda insanları vazgeçirmeye çalışıyor, bu ziyaretlerin bir kıymetinin olmadığını iddia ediyor. Ramazan boyunca Eyüp Sultan camisi yenileme çalışmaları bahanesi ile kapalı tutuldu. Bu durum, bu mubarek ayda böyle ziyaretlerle, Peygamber Efendimizie SAS'e yakın olmaya çalışan gerçek Müslümanların kalbini kırmaktadır. Bu sadece Türkiye ve İstanbul`a has bir durum değildir. Sahabelerin, Peygamberimizin (SAS) akrabalarının yada Büyük Azizlerin yattığı bütün Müslüman ülkelerde olmaktadır. Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri onlara cevap verir ve Cübbeli Ahmet Hoca ve diğer tüm İmamları bu fitneyi durdurmak için seslerini yükseltmeye çağırır.

"السلطان أبو أيوب الأنصاري رضي الله عنه ". مفتي اسطنبول يعيق الناس عن زيارة مقام الصحابي الجليل والسلطان الروحي لإسطنبول ، حضرة أبو أيوب الأنصاري رضي الله عنه ، مدعيا أن هذه الزيارة لا قيمة لها . مسجد حضرة أبا أيوب مغلق طوال شهر رمضان المبارك لأنهم يقولون أنه "تحت التجديد"، وهذا هو الوضع الذي يكسر قلوب المسلمين الحقيقيين الذين يسعون إلى التقرب من نبيهم صلى الله عليه وسلم وخاصة في هذا الشهر الكريم من خلال هذه الزيارة . هذا ليس مخصص لتركيا أو اسطنبول . هذا يحدث في جميع البلدان الإسلامية حيثما هناك قبر صحابي أو أحد أقرباء النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم أو أينما وجد أحد الأولياء الكبار . مولانا أجابهم وحث الخوجة أحمد جبالي وجميع الأئمة على الكلام ووقف هذه الفتنة .

title.text: How Is It in the Grave?

info.text: Ramazan Sohbetleri: "Kabirde Nasil Olacak? - How Is It in the Grave? - أحوال القبر". Rarely has Mawlana spoken about the life in the grave and what it can carry for its owner from punishment or reward. This makes tonight's sohbat a very special one. In this sohbat too, Mawlana again and again urges Jubbeli Ahmad Hoja to stop talking about abstract theoretical issues and theological debates, and, instead, to deal with issues that have immediate influence on the daily reality of every Muslim.

Mawlana started "Ramazan Sohbetleri" (The Ramadan Sohbats). Everyday he gives a sohbat in Turkish. He calls Baba Tahsin (from the Black sea region) and Haji Kamaludin (from Anatolia) to attend these sohbats and be directly addressed by him as representatives of their people. Mawlana addresses Jubbeli Ahmat Effendi, an eminent Imam and preacher in Istanbul who give daily well-viewed religious lessons on Turkish TV. Mawlana directs him as to what and how to address the people in order to achieve the best benefit for Islam and Muslims. These sohbats are very lively. They deal with very important social and religious issues but in an incredible ironical style to show the people where their wrong behaviors, beliefs and ideas would finally take them. Mawlana does not give permission to translate every sohbat of these however, because some are very Turkish in their subject matter and style. Today's sohbat is translated, "Oruç Tutunuz! - Fast! - !صوموا".
A Dutch "Pilgrim to Jerusalem" stops on his way in Cyprus and comes to Lefke to meet Shaykh. He starts off his way with a question and finds its answer in Lefke but will carry on with his trip.

title.text: The Appointment of Shaykh Mohammad in Sham Sherif
Şeyh Mehmet Efendi Şamı Şerife Tayin Oldu
تعيين شيخ محمد في الشام الشريف

info.text: After fajr prayer, Mawlana spoke about Shaykh Mohammad's spiritual power that qualifies him to carry out his new mission in Sham and the whole area. Mawlana mentions the 40 Spiritual Beings, guardians of Sham, and how they were looking at the Preserved Tablet for the Divine order and now the purpose of the present fitna is clean Sham from the Sufiyyanis. Because of the important nature of this sohbat, "The Appointment of Shaykh Mohammad in Sham Sherif - تعيين شيخ محمد في الشام الشريف" we asked Mawlana specifically about it, if we should broadcast it or not. Mawlana said to broadcast.

title.text: Thereover Zakariyyah Called upon His Lord (3:38)

info.text: Mawlana asked Sh. Kayyal, from Sham, about his understanding of the Quranic verse, "Thereover Zakariyyah Called upon His Lord (3:38) - هنالك دعا زكريا ربه". Mawlana shows in this ayat and in few others an irrefutable argument against Wahabis and a big lesson for the nation about the edeb of duaa.

We received the following email: saudis delayed the hijri calendar by one day. pl. Inform His Highness Sh. Nazim, that I had been verifying saudi hijri dates till 12th October, till that time it was haj akbar, but 15th October they changed the date , and 15th and 16th October both days the hijri date is 18th Zulqad. They delayed the calendar by one day so that there is no chance of Haj akbar. I have the scanned newspapers for 15th and 16th october. Then we found an old clip, filmed on the 28th of July, in which Mawlana speaks about the same point. Mawlana gave permission to broadcast this video. Mawlana, however, said that the dates in this sohbat are spiritual dates and that everyone should observe the official dates for the Day of Arafat and of Eid declared by their communities and have full trust in Allah.

Mawlana says that the main goal for anyone who calls people to Allah, whether he is Imam or Wa'iz, is to soften people's hearts and to move their love for Prophet (sas). It is through that love that people seek the way of Allah. "So Relate the Stories - فاقصص القصص"

title.text: And a Monasticism They Invented, We Have Not Made It Obligatory on Them (57:27)
bir ruhbaniyet ihdas ettiler ki, onu onların üzerlerine yazmamıştık (57:27)
و رهبانية ابتدعوها ما كتبناها عليهم

info.text: Mawlana asked Shaykh Kayyal, the visiting 'Alim from Sham Sherif, if there is Monasticism in Islam. Is Monasticism permissible in Islam? What is the true meaning of monasticism? "And a Monasticism They Invented, We Have Not Made It Obligatory on Them (57:27) - و رهبانية ابتدعوها ما كتبناها عليهم". This Ayat proves that there is something for the nation of the Beloved (sas) to learn from it.

In a video filmed a couple of months ago, Mawlana related some stories about the Shaykhs at the time of Grandshaykh, Shaykh Abdullah ad-Daghestani (أعلى الله تعالى درجاته دائماً - May Allah always raise his degrees) and the Adab and appreciation they had for each other. Mawlana explained to his guest, a Syrian scholar, that there are many true shaykhs but what distinguishes the Grandshaykhs of the Golden Chain is "The Great Secret - السر الأعظم".

في فيديو صُوًر منذ شهرين ، مولانا روى بعض القصص للمشايخ في زمن مولانا الشيخ عبد الله الداغستاني ( أعلى الله تعالى درجاته دائماً ) والأدب والتقدير لبعضهم البعض . مولانا فسًر لضيفه ، عالم سوري ، أنه هناك الكثير من مشايخ الحقيقة لكن ما يميًز المشايخ العظام للسلسلة الذهبية هو " السر الأعظم "...

title.text: Do Not Be a Donkey for the West

info.text: Mawlana advises Pakistanis who live in Europe and all Muslims who live in Western countries, "Do Not Be a Donkey for the West".
Mawlana gives a strong and precise order and ask for it to be made known, "Be with the Sultan".

title.text: Mahdi (as) Will Receive the Emanat (Trust) from the Khalifa

info.text: Mawlana explains that the presence of Caliphate is required by Islamic Shari'at as the pillar of the Islamic community. The Caliph has to have the power and authority of a Sultan in order to be able to implement Shari'at and protect it. The fall of the Muslim communities out of the umbrella of Islam into secularism and even atheism was allowed and facilitated by the abolishment of the Islamic Ottoman Caliphate and the break down of the Muslim Ummah into small states each adopting democratic systems of government. But, "Mahdi (as) Will Receive the Emanat (Trust) from the Khalifa - Mehdi (as) Halifeden Emaneti Alır".

Yesterday, in an address to a well-known Turkish thinker and writer, Mawlana explained that there are two kinds of meetings. Mawlana also explained how to reach "A Rahmani Meeting - مجلس رحماني - Rahmani Meclis"

title.text: A Proclamation from the Saints of Sham

info.text: Last night Mawlana made a very important announcement about the conditions and the role of the Naqshibandi Tariqat in Sham and the position of Shaykh Mohammad Effendi, his son. Mawlana said that these new instructions from Abdalu Sham were the reason for the visit of Shaykh Ahmad Al-Kayyal, a big Alim from Sham. "A Proclamation from the Saints of Sham - بلاغ من أبدال الشام".

title.text: A Proclamation and Baiat from the Saints of Sham
بلاغ و بيعة من أبدال الشام

info.text: The main Balagh / proclamation is followed by an important Baiat. "A Proclamation and Baiat from the Saints of Sham - بلاغ و بيعة من أبدال الشام".
"Seyyidi Khalid al-Baghdadi" is an important Shaykh in the Golden Chain. No silsila can claim that it is a Naqshibandi silsila without including Shaykh Khalid.

title.text: The Ottomans and the Islamic Caliphate

info.text: Mawlana explains the necessity of having a Khalifa for Muslims. The presence of an Islamic Caliphate is a legal requirement of Islamic Shari'at. But these Shaytans have removed the Caliphate and have fooled the Muslims into using Democratic systems and man-made laws. Without an Islamic Caliphate, the Muslim nation is left bare and defenseless against the onslaught of unbelievers, tyrants and oppressors. This is true not only for the Islamic world, but the Christian one as well. Atheism spread quickly and powerfully in Europe after the fall of the kingdoms and the spread of nationalist democratic states. "Osmanlılar ve İslam Hilafeti - The Ottomans and the Islamic Caliphate - الخلافة العثمانية خلافة إسلامية”

title.text: It Was a Dream I Was Waiting For

info.text: Yesterday the Greek journalist, Mr. Yorgos Xepapadakos, made an important interview with Mawlana. Mr. Yorgos smartly knew that to truly meet with the Master, you need to give in to him. Therefore, he open heartedly met with Mawlana, yet, was able to handle an excellent interview; one, that so many people will benefit from. Mawlana was pleased with Mr. Yorgos, and supported him. He called him, My Grandson. "It Was a Dream I Was Waiting For”.
"The World Today - الدنيا اليوم" has reached a state where justice, honesty, reason and understanding have no place any more. In these conditions, Mawlana says, "Be careful whom you trust”.

What is the secret in small things that allows them to grow and become great? How can a poor Orphan (sas) in the unknown desserts of Arabia become the Founder a worldwide religion with millions of sincere followers from all-over the world, allowing history and civilization to be born on these lands? How could the Great Ottomans rule the whole world raising Allah's word and the Banner of His Prophet (sas)? How could such a magnificent empire be destroyed by a group of young people, whose beliefs, intentions and lineages are obscure? Why, "We are Osmanlis / Ottomans"? And what can we do to save the honor of Islam? These are some of the issues Mawlana addresses in the important Sohbat, "Müslümanız -We Are Muslims - نحن مسلمون".

”The Old Maqams of Lebanon - مقامات وزيارات بلبنان" honoring an old Lebanese brother, Mawlana remembers and reminds of all the old important holy tombs in Lebanon. These Maqams many people do not know or forgot about but, as Mawlana said, their traditional character has been kept intact, a quality which makes them unique and which Mawlana admires.
Addressing some guests from Kuwait, Mawlana explained how everything in this life passes away and how Allah (swt) is pleased with His thanking servant, "Thank to Allah - شكرا لله".

Last Thursday, Mawlana gave a special English sohbat. In this sohbat, Mawlana left no subject untouched. He explained something about everything. And because of the wide scope of subjects in this sohbat, it was difficult to find it a proper name. When this was mentioned to Mawlana he said call it, "Nasihah Lil 'Ammah - نصيحة للعامّة" (= Advice to All).

Someone asked about the interpretation of the holy verse, "وسع كرسيه السموات و الأرض" And Mawlana's answer was the important sohbat, "Sormayin! - Don't Ask!" This sohbat identifies the basic requirements for seeking and acquiring knowledge. Without meeting these requirements, there is no real question or true knowledge. It is all a waste of time and effort. Thus, the holy verse, "و لا تسألوا عن أشياءإن تبد لكم تسؤكم - Açiklandiği Zaman Hoşunuza Gitmeyecek Olan Şeylerden Sormayın - Do Not Ask about Things Which, If Shown to You, Will Distress You (5:101)”.

Mawlānā gives instructions for performing the special prayers and du‘ā’ of the Night of Mid-Sha‘bān‎. The observances of this night protect from troubles and suffering in the year to come and if death is written it will be with belief. He makes a beautiful du‘ā’ for all of the Nation of Muḥammad ﷺ.

Mevlana bize Şaban ortasının özel ibadetlerini ve dualarını tarif ediyor. Bu geceyi gözetenler dertlerden, belalardan korunur ve ölüm yazıldıysa imanla gitmesi nasip olur. Efendimiz’in ﷺ tüm ümmetine çok güzel dua ediyor.

مولانا يعطي تعليمات لأداء الصلوات الخاصة والدعاء في ليلة النصف من شعبان . الاحتفالات في هذه الليلة تحمي من المتاعب والمعاناة في السنة القادمة وإذا كان مكتوب الموت سيكون ذلك على الإيمان . دعا دعاء جميل لكل أمة محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم .

title.text: Do They Not Look at the Camels How They Are Created (88:17)
Ya hâlâ bakmazlar mı o deveye: nasıl yaratılmış? (88:17)
أفلا ينظرون إلى الإبل كيف خلقت

info.text: At dinner table, Mawlana asked about the meaning of the Quranic Ayat, "Do They Not Look at the Camels How They Are Created - أفلا ينظرون إلى الإبل كيف خلقت". Mawlana explains about the interpretation of Quranic verses.

title.text: As If They Are Alarmed Donkeys, Fleeing From a Lion (74:50,51)
Aslandan ürkerek kaçan yabani merkeplere benzerler
كأنهم حمر مستنفرة، فرت من قسورة

info.text: "As If They Are Alarmed Donkeys, Fleeing From a Lion (74:50-51) - كأنهم حمر مستنفرة، فرت من قسورة" is a vivid Quranic description of the condition of unbelievers. It doesn't only describe the unbelievers in the time this holy verse was revealed, but its eternal truth extends to include the whole human condition of our times.

As he promised, Mawlana continues with the themes started in the earlier Sohbat, "The Introduction to Sohbat - المقدمة للصحبة". In "The City of Knowledge - مدينةُ العلمِ", Mawlana explains the conditions needed for acquiring knowledge, the unlimited levels of knowledge and the value of knowledge versus that of Edeb. Knowledge allowed 'Azazil to reach the stations of angles, but the lack of Edeb made him fall into that of Iblis. Then comes the Holy verse, "So do you believe in part of the Scripture and disbelieve in part? (2:85) - أفتؤمنون ببعض الكتاب و تكفرون ببعض؟" and, with it, Mawlana's Fatwa which can be considered the most important Fatwa in our times.

Mawlana in a short Sohbat to Daghistani brothers explained the conditions for a mureed to become Ma'zoon (an authorized representative of Shaykh) and for entering Khalwat (seclusion). Mawlana recites the Golden Chain. "With People from Daghistan - مع أهل داغستان"

title.text: Ask for Rizq from Ar Razzaq

info.text: The Pakistani ambassador to one Arabic country came to visit Mawlana and ask for his Dua. Mawlana said he will make the Dua but that Dua is not the only important thing. "Ask for Rizq from Ar-Razzaq".

Last Thursday, early in the morning, Mawlana asked his granddaughter if she was fasting and she said, "Yes". Mawlana asked if she knows about "The Benefits of Fasting" and she said, "No!" Therefore, Mawlana gives a very important explanation.

The famous Egyptian calligrapher, Mr. Ahmad Mostafa, was visiting Mawlana this week. He presented three pieces of his precious artwork as a humble gift to Mawlana. Mawlana asked us to film this event. "حروف تتكلم - Letters That Talk".

Mawlana recites the names of some of the well-known Muslim thinkers of the modern era and warns that their ideas have "Misguided the People - وضللوا الأمة". They adopted many Western and Satanic ideas and principles and implemented them in Muslim thought and society, ending up with a general Muslim ideology that is not in compliance with Allah's Shari'at or the historical heritages of these Muslim nations.

title.text: The Wird of the Holy Month of Sha‘bān‎

info.text: Mawlānā gave important instructions concerning the Holy month of Sha‘bān‎.
Mevlana Şeyh Şaban ayı hakkında önemli talimatlar verdi.
أعطى مولانا تعليمات مهمة بشأن شهر شعبان المبارك .

How can the people attending a Sohbat affect the nature and quality of this Sohbet? It is an important point that Mawlana explains in, "The Introduction to Sohbat - المقدمة للصحبة". It is a crucial point in learning and understanding that is little spoken about or ever made clear to seekers of knowledge.
When Shaykh Hisham Kabbani was here in Lefke, a group of Lebanese brothers were visiting Mawlana. "Conversing Together - مسامرة".

Mawlana was asked about those who object to the use of Prophet's (sas) names and the names of Saints. Mawlana gave a strong indisputable answer. "The Names - الأسماء" is an important Sohbat in which Mawlana powerfully undermines the unspoken assumptions of the Wahhabi mentality.

title.text: And Verily You (sas) Are in Our Eyes

info.text: An Iranian Professor asks Mawlana about the meaning of "فإنك بأعيننا - And Verily You (sas) Are in Our Eyes". Mawlana corrects this Sayyed's interpretation and gives a simple and short but a profound understanding of this Quranic verse and essential attribute of Prophet (sas).
"All Is Changing", is an important advice Mawlana gave to an Iranian young man. It tells the young ones about the value of this life, and of good education and true knowledge.
"But Be Men of Allah -ولكن كونوا ربانيين" is the Quranic order by which Mawlana refutes all the claims of Wahhabis, Salafis and even Sufis?

title.text: How Can the Muslim Nation Reach a Straight Way?
كيف يمكن للأمة أن يستقيم أمرها؟

info.text: Today after Fajr prayer Mawlana said that the tajjali of Laylatu-l Israa was v strong and there is no place for irresponsible attitudes any more. "How Can the Muslim Nation Reach a Straight Way? - كيف يمكن للأمة أن يستقيم أمرها؟". In this sohbat Mawlana posed the question and provided the answer.
Talking about Laylatu-l Israa - عن فضل ليلة الإسراء

title.text: To the Mountain of Knowledge, Kooh Jawahir

info.text: Mawlana warmly welcomed his honorable Iranian guest. Addressing him about the value of true knowledge, Mawlana made an exquisite comparison between "True" knowledge and "Theoretical" one, and gave a brilliant example for theoretical knowledge. Mawlana said that his guest has visited him several times and every time he comes, he comes asking for "Kooh Jawahir - كوه جواهر".
A Group of Turkish Ladies together with their Hoca Hanim came to visit Mawlana last week. Mawlana praised their Islamic dress and their lights and asked what is "The Moon's Prayer - Ay'ın Münacaatı".

title.text: Every Day Has a Different Manifestation

info.text: “Every Day Has a Different Manifestation - Her Günün Tecellisi Başkadır". The Manifestations of Reality is never-ending and there is no limit for it. Mawlana gave this sohbat after Fajr and said that it is important and that it should be translated.

Mawlana gave a very powerful message to The Respected Shaykh of Al-Azhar Al-Sharif. In this important Sohbat Mawlana addressed the questions of seeking knowledge and good advice. Prophet (sas) said to consult. But whom should we consult with? How to seek knowledge? And from whom should we accept advice. "Certain News Is with Juhayna - و عند جهينة الخبر اليقين"

title.text: The Secret and the Secret behind the Secret

info.text: At the dinner table, Mawlana addressed his European guests. He explained the possible power of the zero. Mawlana explained that true knowledge lies in the secret that only the like knows the like. When asked why mankind is drunk, Mawlana said that it is the frustration of the finite human being within the infinite dominions of Being. It is "The Secret and the Secret behind the Secret"

title.text: Whoever Does Not Accept Advice Will Have to Regret
من لا يقبل النصيحة حلّت له الندامة

info.text: Yesterday Mawlana gave a strong address to the Arabs and all Muslim nations. "Whoever Does Not Accept Advice Will Have to Regret - من لا يقبل النصيحة حلّت له الندامة". When asked about this sohbat, being powerful but very light without any heaviness, Mawlana said that is because it did not take the side of the people alone but also of their governments. So it kept the balance. In this Sohbat too, Mawlana asked about the meaning of the last lunar eclipse. As a sign sent by Allah to His creation what does it point to?

title.text: A Message to His Majesty the King of Morocco
إلى جلالته ملك المغرب: خطاب من مولانا الشيخ محمد ناظم الحقاني

info.text: After Fajr prayer today, Mawlana said that he has an important message for his majesty the King of Morocco. Mawlana's message is strong and urgent and is based on the King's political address that was shown by all TV channels last night.
"Thanks a Lot to Allah - Allaha Çok Şükür" is a simple Sohbat that contains a very important message to each one of us. It is a Sohbat that concerns everybody.

How can the Nation that carried the banner of the Prophet ﷺ and was entrusted with the seat of Islamic Caliphate, reach the levels of ignorance and unbelief it is suffering from now? The tragic history of the modern Muslim world is summarized. At the turning point in history, Mawlānā congratulates his Excellency Mr. Tayyib Erdoğan on his electoral win, advising him to free the guilty ones from the jails, for "Those who forgive, the country improves".

Peygamber sancağını taşıyan, İslam halifesi koltuğu emanet edilen bir millet nasıl olur da bugünkü cehalet ve inançsızlık seviyesine gelebilir? Modern Müslüman dünyasının trajik tarihi özetleniyor. Tarihteki dönüm noktasında Şeyh Efendi Sn. Tayyip Erdoğan'ı seçim zaferi dolayısıyla tebrik ediyor. Hapistekileri serbest bırakmasını tavsiye ediyor. "Affederseniz, ülke ilerler."

كيف يمكن للأمة التي حملت راية النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم وعهد إليها بمقر الخلافة الإسلامية أن تصل إلى مستويات الجهل وعدم الإيمان التي تعانيها الآن ؟ وهذا يلخص التاريخ المأساوي للعالم الإسلامي الحديث . وفي نقطة التحول في التاريخ ، يهنئ مولانا معالي السيد طيب أردوغان على فوزه الانتخابي ، وينصحه بإطلاق سراح المذنبين من السجون ، لأن "أولئك الذين يسامحون ، تتحسن البلاد ".

title.text: Help the People Correct Their Understanding

info.text: Some Chinese sisters came to say goodbye to Mawlana after staying two weeks in Mawlana's hospitality. Mawlana asked them to help their fellow people correct their understanding.

Before Asr Prayer Mawlana gave a very important sohbat. Mawlana mainly addressed the Turkish people, but the message is for the whole Arabic and Muslim world with all its ethnic and religious groups and factions. The message is strong and urgent! "Insanın Şerefi Nedir? - What Gives Man Honor?”

title.text: The Seclusion in the Holy Maqam of Seyyidina Abdul Qadir al Jilani
خلوتي في مقام سيدي عبد القادر الجيلاني

info.text: An Iraqi guest, without thinking asked Mawlana if he has ever met with Seyyidi Abdul Qadir al-Jilani. "The Seclusion in the Holy Maqam of Seyyidina Abdul Qadir al-Jilani - خلوتي في مقام سيدي عبد القادر الجيلاني"
After Fajr prayer, Mawlana gave a sohbat about the advice GrandShaykh's Mother was giving: "Keep Your Hand Open!”.

Some brothers from Saudi Arabia heard about Mawlana from the Internet and came to meet him. They brought Mawlana a piece of the cover of Prophet's (sas) holy grave in Medina. Mawlana made a strong dua for the one who brought it. Then Mawlana directed a general criticism to Saudis and gave them some important advice. Mawlana also recalled some of his memories in Riyadh. "With Some Saudis - مع إخوان من السعودية".

title.text: For Holy People of China: God Save You and Every Good One

info.text: Mawlana advised some Chinese sisters not to work outside their houses. They said that they are all unmarried. Mawlana said, "I know" and explained to them the true meaning of justice. Then he spoke about an essential characteristic of the Chinese nation and wrote them, "For Holy People of China: God Save You and Every Good One".

Mawlana was asked about the young people in Egypt who, for the sincere love of their country, are willing to, and did, sacrifice everything to free their people from poverty and oppression. How can these young ones succeed in their intentions and be rewarded for their deeds. Mawlana posed an important question: "What Is the Main Goal? - ما هو الهدف الرئيسي".

title.text: There Is No Harm or Damage in Islam
لا ضرر و لا ضِرار في الإسلام

info.text: One day after Fajr, Mawlana asked about the difference in meaning that a native Arabic speaker would understand between the two words: "ضرر" (harm) and "ضِرار" (the exchange of the verb - in this case "the harm" - between two parties). This will shed some light on the meaning and the value of the Prophet's (sas) hadith (saying): "There Is No Harm or Damage in Islam - لا ضرر و لا ضِرار في الإسلام". There is no redundancy in Prophet's (sas) speech - Astaghfirullah, Never!

A murid from old time with some of his family members came to visit Mawlana yesterday. Cat Stevens, or Yusuf Islam, spent pleasant 45 minutes in Mawlana’s sohbat. Because he is “My Brother Shaykh Yusuf”, as Mawlana called him, Mawlana sang for him, he sang for Mawlana, and both sang together.

title.text: Long Live Those Who Accept the Truth!

info.text: In a meeting with two professors, Mawlana explains many of the truths that are absent from our political and social lives and many of the falsehoods that came to replace them. Mawlana stresses the importance of distinguishing between truth and falsehood and of accepting the truth. Therefore, "Yaşasın Doğruyu Kabul Edenler - Long Live Those Who Accept the Truth!"

title.text: The Only Effective Tariqat Is Naqshi and Sahibu Zaman Is Naqshi
Yürüyen Tarikat Nakşidir ve Sahibu Zaman Nakşidir

info.text: Shaykh Mohammad, an elderly man, came only to see Mawlana and kiss his hand. After kissing the hand and without asking for anything else, he got up to leave. Mawlana told him not to go yet because there was some emanat (trust) for him. "The Only Effective Tariqat Is Naqshi and Sahibu Zaman Is Naqshi".
Tek Yürüyen Tarikat Nakşidir ve Sahibu Zaman Nakşidir

Mr. Metin Shady, a prominent figure in the world of media, business and politics of the Cypriot society. Metin Bey came to ask Mawlana about his brother-in-law who is being hospitalized in London. Mawlana's response was totally unexpected! And thus we have the unique sohbat, "Do Not Waste Yourself". Despite its serious subject and message, the sohbat is incredibly funny.

title.text: And Spend on the Way of Allah (2:195)

info.text: A brother from Kuwait was visiting Mawlana two days ago. Haji Youssef, the Kuwaiti, carried to Mawlana the love and salams of his family and all the brothers and sisters in Kuwait. Mawlana was very pleased with him and addressed him in the Sohbat, "And Spend in the Way of Allah - وانفقوا في سبيل الله". In this sohbat Mawlana explains many of the points of debate among Muslims in the clearest and most concise way.

title.text: The Conditions and the Misfortunes of the Nation of the Beloved (saw)
أحوال و أهوال أمة الحبيب صلى الله عليه و سلم

info.text: This morning, Mawlana, addressing Shaykh Hisham Effendi, gave an important analysis of "The Conditions and the Misfortunes of the Nation of the Beloved (saw) - أحوال و أهوال أمة الحبيب صلى الله عليه و سلم" (particularly in regard to events in Syria), and a strong warning.
A group of Algerians and Moroccans living in France came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana asked them to "Spread the Lights of Islam".

"Do Whatever You Will - اعملوا ما شئتم" is one of the holy verses which Mawlana recited in his address to Shaykh Hisham Effendi, few days ago, about the on-going tragedies in the Muslim World. Mawlana said that Allah (swt) tells His servants that they are free to do what they like but that does not mean that they will not have to account for their deeds. And in it lies the secret of Divine Justice and of the Divine Promise to support to believers.

Few days ago, Mawlana gave this sohbat addressing Haji Rukeya. "Her Derde Derman - A Cure for Every Illness" starts in a very deep way telling about Grandshayk's old murids. The tone of the Sohbat then alters and becomes very sarcastic providing one of the most brilliant satires of our modern times. The Sohbat is incredibly funny, but behind that is Mawlana's pity for his old-time schoolmate, the previous president of Turkish Cyprus, Denktash, who lies helpless in the Intensive Care without any chance for recovery.

Haji Fadia, more than 30-year murid from Lebanon, after fajr prayer, asked Mawlana an important question. She said that many brothers and sisters continue with whatever bad habits they have, such as smoking, drinking, etc. and if they are criticized, they give the argument, "If Allah wants me to change, He would have changed me. If Allah wants me to leave this habit, He would have made me leave it. I am only a follower of the Divine will and schedule." Mawlana answered this critical point in the clearest, simplest and most conclusive way." As You Have Seduced Me - بما أغويتني".
Even an ant can defeat shaytan. Look to the Prophet (sas) and be a lion.
Bir karınca bile şeytanı yenebilir. Peygamber Efensimize (sas) bakınız ve aslan olunuz.
حتى نملة يمكنها هزيمة الشيطان . انظر إلى النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم وكن أسداً .

title.text: نور محمد صلى الله عليه و سلم

info.text: Long live Hajji Mehmet. May we be dressed in the Light of Muhammad (sas)
Uzun yaşa Hacı Mehmet. Hz. Muhammed SAS, in nuru ile giyinmiş olalım.
العمر الطويل لك يا حج محمد . نرجو أن نلبًس بنور محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم .
This small sohbat speaks to the heart of the matter.
Bu kısa sohbet meselenin tam kalbine konuşuyor.
هذه الصحبة الصغيرة تتحدث في صلب الموضوع .
A Du'a for every new day, every new glory.
Her yeni gün için bir Dua, yeni bir Zafer.
دعاء لكل يوم جديد ، لكل عظمة جديدة .

Mawlana speaks about his children and grandchildren. He emphasizes that anything done for the self is worthless. Only what is done for Allah has value. So give to those in need, don't fear. What you give is never lost. Build and don't destroy.

Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri, çocukları ve torunları hakkında konuştu. Kendimiz için yapılan şeyin kıymeti olmadığını vurguladı. Sadece Allah için yapılanların kıymeti vardır. Muhtaç olanlara veriniz ve korkmayınız. Verdikleriniz hiçbir zaman kaybolmaz. Yapıcı olun yıkıcı olmayınız.
مولانا يتحدث عن أبنائه وأحفاده . أنه يشدد على أن أي شيء تفعله لنفسك لا قيمة له . فقط ما تفعله في سبيل الله له قيمة . لذلك اعطِ للمحتاجين ، لا تخف . ما تعطيه لا ينقص أبدا. ابني ولا تدمر .
Mawlana prays for the opening of Sham, for the strength of lions in order to destroy the fortresses of shaytan, to live only to serve Allah.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri Şamı-Şerifin açılması için dua etti, arslanların güçlenip şeytanın kallelerini yıkmaları için, sadece Allaha Kulluk etmeleri için dua etti.
مولانا يدعو لفتح الشام ، لقوة الأسود من أجل تدمير حصون الشيطان ، للعيش فقط لخدمة الله.
Mawlana makes a prayer for the month of Safarul Khayr. Safar comes like a whip to put the world in order. May we benefit from its virtues and may its troubles be kept far from us.
Şey Efendi Hazretleri Safer Ayı hayrı için dua etti. Safer ayı dünyayı nizama koymak için bir kırbaç gibi gelir. Erdemlerinden faydalanalım ve belaları bizlerden uzak olsun.
مولانا دعا دعاء لشهر صفر الخير . صفر يأتي مثل السوط لوضع العالم في النظام . نرجو ان نستفيد من فضله ونرجو أن تكون متاعبه بعيدة عنا .

To the great joy of all those present Mawlana joined the congregation for Dhuhr prayer today. After the prayer he made a short dua in which he announced the good news of the opening of Sham and the coming of S. Mahdi (as).

Burada olan herkese büyük sevinç, Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bugün öğle namazı için cemaata katıldı. Namazdan sonra kısa bir dua etti ve Şamın açılması ve Mehdi Aleyhisselamın gelişi ile alakalı iyi haberleri açıkladı.
فرحة كبيرة لجميع الحاضرين ، انضم مولانا لمصلي صلاة الظهر اليوم . بعد الصلاة دعا دعاء قصير والذي أعلن فيه بُشرى فتح الشام وقدوم سيدنا المهدي عليه السلام .
Ask your Lord for power and strength. Ask from the One who grants are endless and whose generosity is endless. Ask from the One who give, who takes, and who holds. Say, Hu, Ya Hu.
Allahınızdan güç ve kuvvet isteyiniz. Bahş ve çömertliği sonsuz olandan isteyiniz. Veren, alan ve tutandan isteyiniz. Hu, Ya Hu, deyiniz.
اطلبوا من ربكم السلطة والقوة . اطلبوا من الواحد الذي منحه لا حصر لها والذي كرمه لا نهاية له . اطلبوا من الواحد الذي يعطي ، الذي يأخذ ، والذي يمسك . قولوا ، هو ، يا هو .
Mawlana’s longing plea to his Lord. Ask Him! Everything is in His Hands, He gives whatever we want. No one is deprived at our Lord’s Door.
Şeyh Efendi Hazretlerinin Rabbine özlem yalvarışı. ALLAH'tan isteyiniz. Herşey O'nun elindedir, biz ne istersek O verir. Hiçkimse Rabbimizin kapısında mahrum bırakılmadı.
دعا مولانا ربه بشوق . اطلبوا منه ! كل شيء في يديه ، يعطينا كل ما نريده . ليس هناك أحد محروم على باب ربنا .

Let us live for You, O Lord. You love what is beautiful. Let us be beautiful. 124,000 prophets came each more beautiful than the other, the Prophet (sas) the most beautiful of all. It is your actions that make you beautiful. Love what is beautiful. Be beautiful.

Ey ALLAH'ım, senin için yaşamamıza izin ver. Sen güzel olanı seversin. Güzel olmamıza izin ver. 124,000 Peygamber geldi herbiri diğerinden daha güzel, Peygamber Efendimiz SAS hepsinden daha da güzel. Amel ve davranışlarınız sizleri güzel yapar. Güzel olanı seviniz. Güzel olunuz.

دعنا نعيش لك ، يا رب . أنت تحب ما هو جميل . دعنا نكون ذو جمال . جاء مئة واربعة وعشرون الف نبي وكل واحد منهم أجمل من الآخر ، والنبي صلى الله عليه وسلم أجمل من الجميع . إنها أفعالك التي تجعلك جميل . احب ما هو جميل . كن جميلاً .

title.text: Defeated Was Rum, the Bastion of Kufr

info.text: The blessings of this month are endless. Ask and your Lord will give. No one is turned away empty handed. The unbelievers may think they are winning but the victory always belongs to Allah.
Bu ayın bereketi sonsuzdur. İsteyiniz ve ALLAH verecektir. Kimse boş elle geri gönderilmemiştir. İmansızlar kazandıklarını düşünebilir fakat zafer her zaman ALLAH'a aittir.
بركات هذا الشهر لا حصر لها . اطلبوا وربكم سيعطيكم . ولا واحد سيُرد خالي الوفاض . الكفار قد يعتقدون أنهم منتصرون ولكن النصر ينتمي دائما إلى الله .

Are you happy? Mawlana asked the ladies gathered in the garden after Juma' Prayer. Women from all over the world, with all kinds of stories and problems, answered as with one voice "Yes, Mawlana" because in his loving presence who can be other than happy. He prayed that they be ladies of Paradise, have Nur on their faces, and be happy.

Mutlumusunuz ? Cuma namazından sonra bahçede toplanan kadınlara Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri bunu sordu. Dünyanın farklı yerlerinden olan ve farklı hayat hikayeleri ile dertleri olan bu kadınlar, 'Evet Şey Efendi' diye ceyapladı, çünkü onun sevgi dolu huzurunda mutlu olmaktan başka ne olunabilir ki. Şeyh Efendi Hazretleri onlara dua ederek, Cennetin Hanımefendileri olmalarını, yüzlerinden Nurun eksik olmamasını ve mutlu olmalarını niyaz eddi.

هل أنتن فرِحات ؟ سأل مولانا السيدات اللواتي تجمعن في الحديقة بعد صلاة الجمعة . أجابت النساء من جميع أنحاء العالم ، مع جميع أنواع القصص والمشاكل ، وبصوت واحد " نعم ، مولانا " لأن في حضوره المحب من يمكنها أن تكون غير فرحة . دعا لهن أن يكن سيدات الجنة ، وتكون وجوههن منورة ، ويكنً فرحات .
O our Lord, we wait for Your Order. We long for Your service. Fill us with iman, ihsan and Islam. We ask everything from You. You are our only Lord. You will not send us away empty handed.

Ey ALLAH'ım, senin emrini bekliyoruz. Sana hızmet etmeyi özlüyoruz. Bizi İman, İhsan ve İslam ile doldur. Her şeyi senden istiyoruz. Sen bizim tek Allahımızsın. Bizleri elleri boş olarak göndermeyeceksin.
يا ربنا ، نحن ننتظر أمرك . نتوق لخدمتك . إملأنا بالإيمان ، الإحسان والإسلام . نطلب كل شيء منك . أنت وحدك ربنا . لن ترجعنا خالي الوفاض .

Ask from Me, says the Lord. He gives us what we ask for and He leaves no one behind. We are weak servants but Shahi Mardan is a dragon. He gives to the good servants to drink from His Love. May we be among them.

Benden isteyin, diyor Allah. Ne istemiş isek onları bize verir ve kimseyi arkada bırakmaz. Bizler aciz Kullarız fakat Shahi Mardan canavardır. İyi kullara kendi sevgisinden içmeleri için ikram eder. Biz onlardan olabiliriz.
اطلبوا مني ، يقول الله . يعطينا ما نطلب ولا يترك أحد . نحن عباد ضعفاء ولكن شاه مردان تنين . يعطي عباده الصالحين ليشربوا من محبته . نرجو أن نكون منهم .

Lefke is very crowded. Brothers and sisters from all over the world keep pouring in. In spite of the endless number of people waiting to see him day and night and his health condition, Mawlana, kindly, meets all and, generously, gives out the grants of Heavens. A group of Pakistanis, followed by a group of Spanish, had their shares, too, of "Nur Muhammadi". May Allah Almighty grant our Shaykh health, strength and long life. Amin.

A big group of bothers and sisters from Ankara came to visit Mawlana. Because of the big number, more than 90 mureeds, they were called in Mawlana's presence in two groups: the first at night and the second the following morning. Their Imam, Ramadan Effendi, was accompanying them.

title.text: For Each Is a Direction toward Which It Faces (2:148)
Her birinin bir yönü vardır, o ona yönelir (2:148)

info.text: After Fajr prayer, Mawlana asked Haji Fadia, an old mureed from Lebanon, about the position of Druze in Lebanon and said that they have a quality that he admires very much. Mawlana also explained that each nation has its unique, distinctive qualities, "For Each Is a Direction toward Which It Faces - وَ لِكُلٍّ وِجْهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَا" and the dangers of becoming cosmopolitan.

title.text: Juma Sohbat: Don't be Drunk! Seek Eternal Life

info.text: Mawlana warns us to stop getting 'drunk' running after pleasing our physical desires. Our ego (donkey) is not going to be allowed into the Divine Presence in eternal life. We should be learning about our heavenly aspects, what our Creator has granted to us from His favors for eternity.

title.text: Islam Is the Religion of Truth

info.text: A big group of Italians, mostly new Muslims, came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana was very pleased with them and gave the powerful Sohbat, "Islam Is the Religion of Truth".

Rauf Denktaş the founder and the first president of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus entered intensive care today. Mawalana visited the ex-president in hospital and made a special duaa for him.

title.text: They Will Not Cease to Differ

info.text: The goal of all the political and social laws in Shari'at (Islamic Divine Law) is to allow the people to live together a good life under the flag of Islam. The Shari’at maintains both: the unity of the Ummah (the nation) and the diversity of its subjects. All materialist ideologies, however, whether it's democratic, socialist or whatever you want to call it, with its lack of spirituality and the absence of the Divine, can never give meaning, value or perspective to the diversity of humanity; and therefore the spread of political unrest and social chaos everywhere. Mawlana in his unique and exquisite way explains it all with an amazing reference to the Holy verse, "They Will Not Cease to Differ - ولا يزالون مختلفين".
A full coverage of Mawlana's visit to the Archbishop of the Orthodox Cypriot church.

Mawlana was invited for lunch by the Reverend Nikiforos, the archbishop of the Orthodox Church in Cyprus. Mawlana accepted the invitation and went accompanied by Shaykh Hisham Qabbani and 10 or more other brothers, from Cyprus, Germany and Pakistan.

In our days, Man is only after enjoying himself and pursuing his pleasures. But is he reaching any enjoyment or finding any pleasure? Addressing his son-in-law, Haji Feridun Bey, Mawlana provides a brilliant analysis of modern times. Mawlana points to the void that characterizes human life in our days whether personally or politically, and Man's pointless effort trying to fill it or cover it up "Terazi - The Balance".

Mawlana was asked also about the green figure seen in Tahrir Square in Cairo, riding on a horse, going between the masses, and then disappearing in the sky. Mawlana declares that "The Age of Miracles - عصر الخوارق" has started. Mawlana also explains an important difference in attitude between Muslims and Christians in our present day.

title.text: Juma Sohbat: Bring Sultan and Shariat Allah

info.text: Mawlana is asking why the whole world fears 2 billion Chinese and not 2 billion Muslims. It is because Muslims are not united under the Sultan and the Holy Shariah of Allah (swt). Mawlana further states that Islam is open. It defines rules for waging war and rights for all people.

title.text: Obama and the Responsibility of World Leadership

info.text: Mawlana was asked about Obama and his role in restoring peace in the Middle East. Mawlana said that first we have to look at the position Obama occupies and what qualifies him for it. Only by understanding the relationship of one's qualification to one's position, can we understand our present condition and where we are heading to! "Obama and the Responsibility of World Leadership".
"We Reached The Border - Hududdayız" is a short sohbat in which Mawlana describes some of the events of the end of times and the coming of S. Mahdi (as) and S. Isa (as).

title.text: The World Is in the Service of Believers

info.text: Mawlana explains the reasons for modern Man's plight. Mawlana also gives a duaa - prayer for protection against storms and natural crises. "The World Is in the Service of Believers - Dünya Müminların Hizmetinde"

title.text: How Can There Be a Creature without a Creator?

info.text: A German sister brought her father and sister to meet Mawlana for the first time. Mawlana honored the elderly man, invited him to his table, and in a powerful sohbat asked him the question, "How Can There Be a Creature without a Creator?" This Sohbat gave so much joy to everyone's heart. Overwhelmed by Mawlana's generosity the elder man, his name now Ibrahim, kissed Mawlana's hand and, with his two daughters, took Bai'at.

title.text: A Letter from the President of Cyprus

info.text: The President of Southern Cyprus - Greek Cyprus did not forget to pay his respects to Mawlana and send a sweet Happy-Birthday note.

Mawlana spoke about those who kill others, kill themselves, carry out suicidal attacks or expose themselves to death by going out in protests. Mawlana explains the position of each of these groups from the Quranic Command, "Do Not Kill Yourselves - و لا تقتلوا أنفسكم". In this important Sohbat Mawlana explicitly points out Edeb as a main pillar in religion and Tariqat and the context for thinking and judgement.

title.text: The Edeb of Giving Sohbat and of Addressing the People

info.text: Talking about Edeb Mawlana mentions the Edeb he is ordered to follow when about to give Sohbat or address the people. When Shaykh Hisham mentioned that GrandShaykh's (qs) Sohbats were much longer, Mawlana said no and mentions something about GrandShaykh's (qs) Sohbats. We kept this part of the Sohbat as an independent short video, "The Edeb of Giving Sohbat and of Addressing the People - آداب الخطاب و الصحبة ", to make sure that its value is not melting in the ocean of the big Sohbat.
A Group of 17 Russians from Ukraine and Moldavia came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana showed them the way to a "Pure Life". They became Muslims and took Baiat.

The "Yeni Osmanilar" from Germany came to visit Mawlana. They have prepared the banner for Haci Emine Sultan's mosque in Cyprus as Mawlana had ordered it. They have prepared several other banners too..

Seek a means to connect with Holy Prophet Muhammad (saw), the beloved representative of Allah (swt). Man seeks a share from the quality of Grandeur / Majesty for the sake of Allah (swt), to be suitable for being in the presence of His Kabriya, "Positive Grandiosity - الكبرياء المحمود".

title.text: لواء النبي صلى الله عليه و سلّم

info.text: Last night Mawlana addressed Shaykh Hisham. Mawlana mentioned the Hadith that Islam starts as a stranger and ends as a stranger. This uniqueness that distinguishes Islam at its beginning up till its end, teaches us something about its Prophet (saw) and "The Prophet's Banner (saw) - لواء النبي صلى الله عليه و سلم" under which the whole Creation seek refuge.

title.text: Juma Sohbat: Warning to Tyrants about the Judgment of Allah Almighty

info.text: Mawlana is warning rulers who are killing their citizens for no reason. They cannot escape from Azrail (as) and the Judgment of Allah Almighty. As they killed in this life, they will be punished themselves in the next.
Mawlana explained the reasons for the Lebanese political dilemma and the way out of it, "Reconciliation Is Best - الصلح خير".

Shaykh Mostafa Alayli, an old Murid of GrandShaykh Abdullah Daghistani (qs) and a cousin of Shaykh Hisham and Shaykh Adnan Qabbani, was visiting Mawlana. After Fajr Mawlana addressed him and explained the reasons behind the troubles in our days, "They Ran after Modern Life - و ركضوا وراء الحياة الحديثة".

“With the London Jama'at" contains several messages that are important not only to the people of London but to all of us too. And like the London Jama'at includes people of different backgrounds, in this sohbat Mawlana speaks in English, Turkish and Arabic answering people's different interests and needs.

Asked about a book of Tafsir written by a Shaykh called Jubbeli Ahmad, a figure of big popularity in the Turkish religious circles, Mawlana asks important questions. These questions should be answered before setting out to achieve such a huge aim as writing more than twenty volumes of Tafsir. In the Sohbat, "Everyone Needs a Guide - Herkese Bir Mürşid Lazım", Mawlana shows the rules for the transmission of Knowledge, whether by learning or by teaching.

title.text: Laying the Foundation of Haji Aminah Sultan's New Mosque in Cyprus
Hacı Emine Sultan için Kıbrıs'ta Yapılan Yeni Caminin Temellerinin Atılması

info.text: Mawlana went to Nicosia to lay the foundation of a new mosque. This new mosque will be built in the name and according to the will of Haji Aminah Sultan, may Paradise be her abode, Mawlana's wife. Mawlana's sons, Shaykh Mohammad Effendi and Haji Bahaa Effendi, and daughters, Haji Naziha Hanim and Haji Rukeya Sultan were all present. Some of his grandsons and many of his murids, too, joined in this blessed event.
"Why Were We Created?" is the important question posed to the big group of murids coming from Glastonbury, Spain and other parts of the World.

title.text: May Our Faces Be Full of Light and Our Hearts Pure

info.text: "May Our Faces Be Full of Light and Our Hearts Pure - Yüzümüz Ak Kalbimiz Pak" is the important dua Mawlana ordered to be made. Addressing some Turkish sisters from Istanbul, Mawlana gives important instructions and orders.

title.text: A Warning to All, Particularly to Cypriots

info.text: This evening, Mawlana gave an important warning and ordered it to be broadcast. "A Warning to All, Particularly to Cypriots - Kıbrıslılara ve Bütün İnsanlara İhtar"

title.text: Prepare against Them Whatever You Are Able of Power (8:60)

info.text: What is happening in Sham today is not without reasons. Mawlana explains some of these reasons. "Onlara Karşı Daima Hazırlıklı Olun - Prepare against Them Whatever You Are Able of Power (8:60)"
"Be with Good People - İyi İnsan İle Görüş" is a short and simple but very sweet advice given to two Iranian young men.

title.text: We Are Capable of Sending Punishment on You

info.text: Many parts of the world suffer from natural crisis. Mawlana explains the ayah, "We Are Capable of Sending Punishment on You - Biz Sizin Üzerinizde Azap Yollarız".

Yesterday Mawlana received the news of the killing of Bin Laden. In a powerful Sohbat Mawlana pointed to us the incomprehensible Mightiness of Allah (swt) and the limitless brutality of Man. After praying two Rak'ats Shukr and wrapping up the Sohbat, Mawlana made an extremely important but subtle distinction between his judgement on that man and Allah's Judgement. A distinction that many believers fail to make and therefore end up in the confusion and the absurdities that are everywhere nowadays. "The Killing of Bin Laden - خبر مقتل بن لادن"
Mawlana gives important advice and instructions "Do Not Run after Dunya - Dünyaya Koşma".

title.text: The Proper Recitation of the Holy Quran and the Story of Kiftaro with GrandShaykh
Kuranın okunuşu ve Kiftaro Büyük Şeyh ile

info.text: A big group of Daghistanis came to visit Mawlana, and out of respect to GrandShaykh, Abdullah Daghistani (Hz.), Mawlana honors Daghistani people. In a Sohbat to some of them, "The Proper Recitation of the Holy Quran and the Story of Kiftaro with GrandShaykh (QS)", Mawlana explains how to recite Quran according to Ahlu Sunnat wal Jam'at and not according to the Wahhabis. Mawlana also tells the story of Shaykh Kiftaro, the Shaykh of Sham, with GrandShaykh (QS).

title.text: Some of the Miracles of GrandShaykh

info.text: In the presence of a big group of Daghistanis, and the presence of old Murids and Khalifas of GrandShaykh, like Shaykh Hisham Efendi and Shaykh Abdu Salam Efendi, and the presence of Shaykh Muhammad Efendi, Mawlana's son, Mawlana recalled many of the sweet memories of GrandShaykh. "Some of the Miracles of GrandShaykh (QS) - Büyük Şeyh Efendi Hz.nin Kerametleri"

title.text: From Pre Eternity to Post Eternity

info.text: Allah (swt) created Man and made him His representative. But how can a created mortal be the representative of the Creator (swt)? And how can the being that is chosen to be the representative of Allah make that much corruption, bloodshed and aggressiveness on the face of the Earth? Mawlana in the unique sohbat, "From Pre-Eternity to Post-Eternity - من الأزلِ إلى الأبد" poses these puzzling questions and answers them. In his explanation, Mawlana provides an unprecedented interpretation of the Divine Names: "Al Qahhar" and "Al Jabbar".
Is Knowledge all that counts on the Way to God? No! Before you can reach the door of True Knowledge, there is an important door you must enter through. "Knowledge and Edeb - İlim ve Edep"

Talking to some brothers and sisters from Holland, Mawlana reminds them of what we, Muslims, had in the past. Before we had a Caliph, we had Shariat Law and we had honor, and today what is left for us? "Yesterday We Were Muslims - Dün Müslümandık".
Mawlana explained the value and meaning of "The Sohbat - الصحبة" and its role in tariqat. Sohbat is the way to the oceans of nearness to Prophet (saw).

Mawlana asks the tyrants in the Muslim world, "Are you not afraid of Allah's Wrath? Do you think Allah will not take the revenge of His innocent servants? Do you think you can do what you like with these weak people?" While posing these questions, Mawlana gives the interpretation of some ayat in the Quran that opens new horizons of understanding. "O Men of Allah! - يا رجال الله"
After the previous sohbat “You Will Not Pass except with a Sultan” Mawlana explained a bit about the world of Jinn. This we kept in an independent video, "The Kings of Jinn - ملوك الجن”

title.text: You Will Not Pass except with a Sultan
Ey cin ve ins toplulukları, eğer göklerin ve yerin bucaklarından aşıp geçmeye güç yetirebilirseniz, hemen aşın (55:33)

info.text: Today after zuhr, Mawlana gave a very important address to all Muslims and non-Muslims. Mawlana asked for this sohbat to be presented properly and translated adequately. "You Will Not Pass except with a Sultan - (55:33) لا تنفذون "إلا بسلطان

title.text: About Economy, Justice and True Education
في الإقتصاد و العدالة و التعليم النافع

info.text: Last night, three Egyptian students came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana kindly explained to these three youngsters, and to all of us, the meanings of "Economy" and of "Justice", and the nature of true "Education".

title.text: What Is the Definition of Shirk?

info.text: Last night, before Shaykh Adnan Effendi left Cyprus to Lebanon, Mawlana gave a very important Sohbat about the Real "Definition of Shirk". Mawlana stressed the importance of this Sohbat and the necessity of its proper presentation and adequate translation. May Allah make it possible Insha’Allah.

Turkey celebrated the Prophet's Blessed Birthday according to the Western calendar. So last week, and on Mawlana's Birthday, was the Western date for his Mawlid Sharif (saw). A group of Turkish Imams and professors and students came to congratulate Mawlana on this blessed occasion. Mawlana gave a beautiful sohbat, "Do Not Be Intimidated - Korkmayınız!"

It is very crowded in Lefke and Mawlana has been seeing many people and giving valuable advice and instructions. With Mawlana's order and madad, we've collected these instructions and have divided them into chapters, to make it easier for the viewer to benefit from all of them, Insha’Allah.

title.text: Certainly, the Friends of Allah for Them There's No Fear or Grief
Muhakak Allah dostlarına korku veya üzüntü yoktur
آلا إن أولياء الله لا خوف عليهم و لا هم يحزنون

info.text: Mawlana asks how can we not honor the ones Allah honored? How can we not honor the Friends of Allah-أولياء الله? "Certainly, the Friends of Allah for Them There's No Fear or Grief - آلا إن أولياء الله لا خوف عليهم و لا هم يحزنون"
Mawlana contemplates some "Holy Verses - مع آيات من الذكر الحكيم"

title.text: That Is What We Were Seeking (18:64): A Picture and a Warning
Dedi ki: «İşte bizim aramakta olduğumuz da bu ya.» Hemen izleri üzerine uyarak geri döndüler. (18:64)
ذلك ما كنل نبغي (١٨:٦٤): صورة و عتاب لأهل مصر

info.text: Mawlana addresses the Egyptians. He shows them a picture that warms each one's heart with the longing for the old days of Beauty and Dignity. Mawlana urges the Egyptians to wake up and correct their steps before it's too late!

title.text: The Defeat of the Plot Against Islam and the Appearance of Mahdi (as)
İslam karşıtının çöküşü ve Mehdi a.s.'ın zuhuru
فشل المخطط ضد الإسلام و بشائر ظهور المهدي عليه السلام

info.text: Mawlana explains the details of the Western plot against Islam. After the lives of Muslims were contaminated with Western non-Islamic practices, the enemies of Islam were waiting for its full collapse. But no! The time of tyrants is up and the time of Mahdi (as) has started.
Mawlana explains the warning Prophet (saw) gave Sayyedina Salman al-Farsi concerning the Arabs. Mawlana also explains the value of Love and Happiness in the relationship of the servant to his Lord.
Be Careful! Some things are Haram!

title.text: The Events in Sham: Tyranny Can Never Last!

info.text: Late at night, Mawlana gave an important Sohbat about the sad events in Syria and said that since Friday prayer yesterday a new Tajjalee (manifestation) has descended.
Mawlana warns Arabs, in particular, and all Muslim, in general that they have been honored with Allah's true religion and, "They Will Be Held Responsible!"

Allah's Throne, is it one Throne? What Are Time and Space? And how is the creation related to Prophet (saw)? This are some of the delicate issues Mawlana explains to Shaykh Adnan and Shaykh Hisham in the unique Sohbat, "Thrones - عروش"

An Interview by the EU Commissioner in Cyprus. Her excellency, the Commissioner, paid this visit to Mawlana to invite him to attend an Interfaith Conference that will be held in Cyprus some time next month. Mawlana answered her invitation by explaining the value of such conferences and the role Religion and religious figures can play in the society and its politics. Mawlana prayed two Rak'ats before he started and said that this is an important Sohbat that must be broadcast.
No limit to the number of worlds or the number of creation. It all points to the Absolute Existence of, The Magnificent Creator of All - ‎خلّاقٌ عظيم.

title.text: The Drunk Mouse and the Rabbani Tsunami

info.text: Mawlana this morning gave a unique Sohbat, The Drunken Mouse and the Rabbani Tsunami - الفارة السكرانة و التسونامي الرباني Mawlana poses a challenging question to all Western Men of Science!

title.text: If Sham Is Corrupted, Then the Whole World Is in Corruption!
Şam'da fitne varsa, bütün dünyada fitne vardır

info.text: "If Sham is corrupted, then the whole world is in corruption! - إذا فسدت الشام، فسدت الدنيا" explains the real reasons behind all the Fitnas that are happening in Syria these days.

title.text: More about Not Going Out at Night!

info.text: Answering some of the inquiries about "Going Out At Night"

An Imam from Turkey came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana praised him and said he is responsible for guiding his people to the True way. Paying the Imam his due respect and in a fatherly manner, Mawlana explained important points about Turkish History, about learning and understanding and about spirituality. Mawlana, also, gave the Imam some Instructions.

title.text: Allah Has His Men: Peaceful Defence and Civil Rebellion
‎ولله رجالٌ‫:‬ دفاع سلمي و عصيان مدني

info.text: "Allah Has His Men - و لله رجال" gives the most unthinkable means of "Peaceful Defense - دفاع سلمي". The means that are suitable for the times we are in and its people! In this unusual Sohbat, Mawlana also explains the value of "Civil Disobedience! - عصيان مدني"

title.text: Up to Where Can Man's Power Reach?

info.text: The prominent journalist and thinker, Dogan Harman, came to visit Mawlana and have a TV interview. In this 40-minute interview, Harman posed many of the questions that are occupying people's minds, individually and collectively, these days. And Mawlana, in his lively style, and appealing mainly to common sense defused all confusion.

title.text: The Hand of S. Al Mahdi (as)

info.text: At dinner Mawlana explained, why the Appearance (Zhuhur) of Sayyidina Al Mahdi became so near and urged Muslims not to listen to Shaytan.
When all nations are leaving their traditional ways and are running after cursed Democracy, then… "Time Is Up - تمّ الوقت"

On Thursday night, the holy night of Juma, Mawlana said he was given instructions to inform people about. Whoever listens and obeys will be safe; and whoever objects, he can blame only himself for whatever is going to happen to him. Mawlana said the world has entered a difficult phase and lots of disasters and afflictions are coming on people. And in every age, there are saints responsible for warning people and now this responsibility is on Mawlana.

title.text: Five Thousand Angels Having Marks of Distinction

info.text: Today at breakfast, Mawlana gave an important Sohbat and ordered it to be broadcast. Mawlana was asked why Tayyib Erdogan, the Turkish prime minister, refuses to interfere in Libya. Mawlana said that this is a delicate issue and gave an important answer. Also, do not be afraid! ALLAH swt sent 3000 angels to assist the Muslims in the Battle of Badr.  These angels had tails extending down their backs from their turbans. Musawwimeen. But ALLAH swt also said that He will send 5000 angels in the future. Mawlana explains the relevance of these verses from Surah al Imran for these times.

title.text: I Never Complained to My Shaykh

info.text: Sharing Blessed Memories of GrandShaykh with some old brothers from Sham, Mawlana said, "I Never Complained To My Shaykh - لم اشتكي لشيخي أبداً"; and in this is the secret of Barakah.
Şam'dan eski dostlarıyla, Büyük Şeyh'in mübarek hatıralarını paylaşan Şeyh Efendi şöyle dedi; "Asla Şeyhime şikayet etmedim" ve bereketin sırrı bunun içindedir.
مشاركاً الذكريات المباركة لمولانا الشيخ مع بعض الأخوان القدامى من الشام ، قال مولانا ، " لم اشتكي لشيخي أبدا " وهذا هو سر البركة .

A jolly group of Egyptian sisters came to visit Mawlana and ask what they should be doing in these times of Fitnas and troubles. Mawlana gave instructions to be followed everywhere in the Muslim world. Mawlana also gave good tidings and exceptionally praised the honourable Shaykh of Al-Azhar A-Sharif.

title.text: The Muslim Has Dignity Alive and Dead
Ölü yada diri Müslümanın şerefi vardır

info.text: Mawlana was asked about the destruction of Muslim graves that was taking place in some Muslim countries, and in the presence of some Arab Dignitaries who were visiting today, Mawlana gave this important and powerful Sohbat.

title.text: Enjoy Your Democracy! Enjoy Your Education!

info.text: In his usual lively and very funny style, Mawlana, last night, gave this lesson about Democracy and girls' education.
Mawlana providing the best model for humility, beautifully and clearly says that, Our Only Way Is That of Servanthood.

title.text: With South Africans: Avoid Wrong Ideas

info.text: Some South African Brothers and Sisters came to visit Mawlana. Mawlana was very pleased with them and pointed to the only safe and true way, that of Ahlu Sunnat Wa Jama'at. Mawlana said all other ways are of no avail.
After Fajr prayer Mawlana gave a Sohbat about a holy Ayat in the Quran. Mawlana said that its value has been shown at Tahajjud and that he was ordered to point it out to Muslims.

Mawlana gave a very valuable sohbat about Imam al-'Asr - Sayyedina al-Mahdi (as). Mawlana related the spiritual meeting that took place between Imam al-'Asr and Grandshaykh Sayyedina Abdullah al-Daghistani, and the question Grandshaykh asked Sayyidina al-Mahdi. In this short English Sohbat Mawlana explained several things that very few people have ever heard before.

title.text: The Nation of the End of Times

info.text: Mawlana gave a beautiful Sohbat to a group of Turkish people who came to visit yesterday. Mawlana urged them to get ready for the big events of the end of times. He also answered their questions concerning their late Shaykh and how to relate to him after taking Baiat with Mawlana.

title.text: Hold to the Dominant Majority: The People of Sunnat
Coğunlukta olan Ehli Sünnet'e bağlı kalın
‎عليكم بالسواد الأعظم: أهل السنة و الجماعة

info.text: When asked about the dilemma the ordinary Muslim has in the face of all these conflicting Mezhabs, schools, opinions, fetwas, practices and movements that have equal claims to truth and rule the Muslim scene in our days, Mawlana pointed to the simplest and only safe way... "Hold to The Dominant Majority: The People of Sunnah - عليكم بالسواد الأعظم: أهل السنة و الجماعة”

Mawlānā talks with a group of men and women from Spain, gives shahādah and bay‘ah. He asks them to give some time to thinking about things beyond their understanding, to look for spirituality and eternity not just this material life. He talks about the names Fāṭimah and La’iqah.

Mevlana, İspanya'dan bir grup kadın ve erkekle konuşup, şehadet getirtti ve biat verdi. Yalnızca bu dünyevi hayatı değil, anlayışlarının ötesindeki şeylerle ilgili biraz zaman ayırıp düşünmelerini, maneviyatı ve sonsuzluğu aramalarını istedi. Fāṭıma ve La’yqa isimleri hakkında konuşuyor.

يتحدث مولانا مع مجموعة من الرجال والنساء من إسبانيا ، يعطي الشهادة والبيعة . طلب منهم إعطاء بعض الوقت للتفكير في أمور تتجاوز فهمهم ، للبحث عن الروحانية والأبدية ليس فقط هذه الحياة المادية . يتحدث عن أسماء فاطمة ولائقة .

The catastrophes in japan marked an unexpected change in human history. Mankind reached their peak in technology and power with their nuclear power stations. They reached the last point of unbelief. One Tsunami changed everything. From now on technology will come down to zero. No more chance for mankind to be proud or trust in technology. Technology is just defeated now! When Mahdi (as) comes, he will say three times Allahu Akbar and after that, there will be no technology anymore. That is beginning now.
Today Mawlana gave good tidings for Libyans and a warning for Egyptians.

Last night Mawlana explained the meanings and some of the lessons that can be taken from the natural crisis - the earthquake and the tsunami - that struck Japan two days ago with its tremendous scope of human tragedy.

title.text: The Non Growing Tree and the Last Signs

info.text: A group of Turkish students came to visit Mawlānā. Mawlānā provided them with a rule they can use to evaluate history and understand historical events. He also gave them some advice about the End of Times.
Bir grup Türk öğrenci Şeyh Efendi'yi ziyarete geldiler. Şeyh Efendi tarihi anlamaları ve doğru değerlendirmeleri için onlara bir kural öğretiyor. Ahir Zaman hakkında da biraz tavsiye veriyor.
جاءت مجموعة من الطلاب الاتراك لزيارة مولانا . زودهم مولانا بقاعدة يمكنهم استخدامها لتقييم التاريخ وفهم الأحداث التاريخية . كما قدم لهم بعض النصائح حول آخر الزمان .

title.text: A Quranic Command and a Fatwa
واعتصموا بحبل الله جميعاً (آل عمران ١٠٣) و فتوى في أهل الذمة

info.text: Mawlana last night gave an extremely important Sohbat, A Quranic Command and A Fatwa - واعتصموا بحبل الله  جميعاً )آل عمران ١٠٣) و فتوى في أهل الذمة. In it, Mawlana gives simple answers to the dilemmas challenging the Muslim mind and a safe way out of the Fitnas threatening the Muslim world. The fitna is taking place among the Muslims. It splits the Muslim Jama'at into factions taking extreme positions against each other, and thus staining Islam with "Extremism" which scares non-Muslims away from Islam, and, even, Muslims away from Shari'at- the Divine Law. The second part of this fitna is between the Muslims and the Christians, of the same community. This rings the bells of civil war and threatens to finish the whole community of believers, whether Muslims or Christians - the ultimate victory of the devil! Mawlana gave this Sohbat in Arabic and asked to spread it everywhere. Mawlana, also, said to write it down and distribute it around.
Mawlānā said this sohbet is important for everyone in this time. He asks “Who are the good people?” And he answers: “Those who know they are weak servants.”
Şeyh Efendi bu sohbetin bu devirde yaşayan herkes için önemli olduğunu söyledi. Şöyle soruyor "Hayırlı insanlar kimlerdir?" Ve cevap veriyor "Aciz kullar olduğunu bilenlerdir."
قال مولانا أن هذه الصحبة مهمة للجميع في هذا الزمن . سأل " من هم الصالحون ؟" وأجاب : " أولئك الذين يعرفون أنهم عباد ضعفاء".

Ask. Allah does not want those who do not ask. What do we ask from our Lord? We ask for servanthood and the strength and power to serve. Let us make our Lord love us by serving His creation. Give us the sword to destroy our ego and let us fill with love and longing.

İsteyiniz. Allah istemeynleri, istemez. Allahımızdan ne istemeliyiz ? Kulluk, güç ve kuvvet isteriz ki hızmet edebilelim. Allahımızın yarattıklarına hızmet ederek kendimizi Onun sevdiklerinden yapalım. Nefsimizi yokedecek kılıcı bize bize ver ve sevgin ve özleminle dolu olmamıza izin ver.
اطلبوا . الله لا يريد أولئك الذين لا يطلبون . ماذا نطلب من ربنا ؟ نطلب العبودية والقوة والسلطة للخدمة . دعونا نجعل ربنا يحبنا من خلال خدمة خلقه . امنحنا السيف لتدمير نفوسنا واملأنا بالعشق والشوق .
What Allah wants are clean and pure servants. Ask for this. Be clean. Be beautiful. Be straight. This is the month of Muharram ask from its many favours from the One whose gifts are endless.
ما يريده الله هو عبيد طاهرين وأنقياء . اطلبوا هذا . كن طاهراً . كن جميلاً . كن مستقيماً . هذا هو شهر محرم اطلبوا من فضائله الكثيرة من الواحد الذي هداياه لا نهاية لها .

title.text: What Is With Allah Is Better (42:36)

info.text: This is the blessed month of Muharram. So ask from your Lord whose earth is wide and whose gifts are overflowing in this month. Don't ask for a dinner table. Ask to serve Allah. Ask from His Habib. There is so much and there is more to come.
